SensorSymphony ATOM 5 The ATOM 5 launched with a model number unknown. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 164.5 x 76 x 8.95 mm and the weight is 193 in grams. Secondly, the display of the ATOM 5 is a 6.74-inch IPS LCD panel with 720 x 1612 pixels resolution. The display is protected with Corning Gorilla Glass. Thirdly and most importantly, it is powered by the SC9863A1 and runs on Android 14. Moreover, it has up to an Octa-Core 1.6GHz CPU.The Symphony ATOM 5 phone has a dual-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of an 8MP and 2MP camera. It has a 5MP selfie camera inside the notch of the display. The video recording capability is 1080p@30fps. According to its RAM and ROM, It has one (4GB/64GB) variant.On the other hand, it can support up to microSDXC using a dedicated slot. Certainly, ATOM 5 has a 5000mAh battery with 10W fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, ATOM 5 is 2G/3G/4G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is rear-mounted.On the other hand, there is WLAN, Bluetooth, and a USB port among the other features.

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.SpecificationBrandSamsungPlatformOS - Android 14, One UI 6.1 | Chipset - Exynos 1330 (5 nm) / Mediatek Dimensity 6300 (6 nm) | CPU - Octa-core (2x2.4 GHz Cortex-A76 & 6x2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) | GPU - Mali-G57 MC2ModelGalaxy A16 5GNetworkTechnology - HSPA, LTE, 5GDimensions164.4 x 77.9 x 7.9 mm | Weight - 200 g | Build - Glass front, plastic back, plastic frame | SIM - Single SIM or Hybrid Dual SIMDisplayType - Super AMOLED 90Hz | Size - 6.7 inches | Resolution - 1080 x 2340 pixelsMemoryCard Slot - microSDXC | Internal - 128GB 4GB RAM, 256GB 8GB RAMMain Camera50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), 5 MP, f/2.2, (ultrawide), 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro)Selfie Camera13 MP, f/2.0SoundLoudspeaker - Yes | 3.5mm jack - NoBattery InfoType - 5000 mAh, non-removable | Charging - 25W wiredOther Features / InfoFingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, gyro, compassDescriptionSamsung Galaxy A16 5GMeet the new Samsung Galaxy A16 5G, it features a stunning Super AMOLED display that’s one of the best in its class. The phone comes in a slim form factor that provides a good grip and a great hand feel. There’s a triple-camera setup with a 50-megapixel main shooter that takes amazing-quality pictures. It’s powered by a 2.4 GHz CPU that produces enough power to smoothly handle all your tasks. The phone is IP54 certified, which means it’s protected against dust and water. To make things even better, it comes with 6 generations of OS updates for future-proofing. Samsung Galaxy A16 5G FeaturesSlim and elegant design with IP54 dust and water resistance.Sharp and vivid display with thin bezels for an immersive experience.Versatile camera setup to capture high-quality photos. The phone comes in a slim form factor that provides a good grip and a great hand feel. There’s a triple-camera setup with a 50-megapixel main shooter that takes amazing-quality pictures. It’s powered by a 2.4 GHz CPU that produces enough power to smoothly handle all your tasks. The phone is IP54 certified, which means it’s protected against dust and water. Brand: Apple Model: iPhone 15 Display Size: 6.1 inches Display Type: Super Retina XDR OLED, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000–2000 nits Display Resolution: 1179 x 2556 pixels Chipset: Apple A16 Bionic (4 nm) Memory: 128GB | 256GB | 512GB Main Camera: 48 MP (wide) | 12 MP (ultrawide) | Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR (photo/panorama) | 4K@24/25/30/60fps, , HDR, Dolby Vision HDR (up to 60fps), Cinematic mode (4K@30fps) Selfie Camera: 12 MP, f/1.9, 23mm (wide) | SL 3D, (depth/biometrics sensor) | HDR, Cinematic mode (4K@30fps) | 4K@24/25/30/60fps gyro-EIS Battery Info: Li-Ion | non-removable, wired Type-C charging, 15W wireless (MagSafe) iPhone 15The Apple iPhone 15 features a stunning design that seamlessly marries durability and elegance. Its display sets a new standard for visual excellence, offering a breathtaking visual experience. The dynamic island feature enhances user interaction and convenience. Powered by an unbelievably impressive performance, it tackles any task effortlessly. Photography enthusiasts will adore the enhanced camera capabilities, which deliver outstanding shots. Notably, the introduction of Type-C connectivity marks a significant step forward for the iPhone, making it more versatile and adaptable than ever. The iPhone 15 truly redefines excellence in the smartphone world. iPhone 15 FeaturesThe stunning design is a result of the fusion between color-infused glass and recycled aluminumSuper Retina XDR OLED display with ceramic shield protection for astounding visualA dynamic island pops up on the top to notify users of important alerts and live activities 48 MP main camera with upgraded resolution and lenses for magnificent photographyA16 Bionic with cutting-edge features that elevate performance to utmost smoothnessWith its optimized, high-capacity battery, it can run for an entire day on a single chargeSupports the Universal Type C charger, allowing you to establish a charging ecosystem Roadside Assistance via satellite is the new emergency feature, along with SOS and Crash Detection

The iPhone 15 truly redefines excellence in the smartphone world. iPhone 15 FeaturesThe stunning design is a result of the fusion between color-infused glass and recycled aluminumSuper Retina XDR OLED display with ceramic shield protection for astounding visualA dynamic island pops up on the top to notify users of important alerts and live activities 48 MP main camera with upgraded resolution and lenses for magnificent photographyA16 Bionic with cutting-edge features that elevate performance to utmost smoothnessWith its optimized, high-capacity battery, it can run for an entire day on a single chargeSupports the Universal Type C charger, allowing you to establish a charging ecosystem Roadside Assistance via satellite is the new emergency feature, along with SOS and Crash Detection

For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. Tecno Spark 40 (6/128GB)The Tecno Spark 40 (6/128GB) is your perfect pick. With its sleek design, ultra-smooth display, and a big battery that keeps up with your lifestyle, this latest release from Tecno is winning hearts in Bangladesh. Whether you're a student, a multitasker, or someone who loves entertainment on the go, the Spark 40 is engineered to deliver the essentials and then some. Smartphones in this price range often come with compromises, but the Tecno Spark 40 manages to stand out by blending top-tier features with affordability. Its 6.67-inch HD+ display, lightning-fast 120Hz refresh rate, and a feature-packed 50MP dual rear camera offer you a premium smartphone experience at a mid-range budget. Add to that a solid Mediatek Helio G81 processor, a generous 6GB RAM, and 128GB storage, and you get a phone that’s ready for multitasking, gaming, and everything in between. Running on the latest Android 15, this phone is as modern and future-ready as it gets.Tecno Spark 40 SpecificationEnjoy smooth scrolling and vibrant visuals on a large 6.67-inch IPS LCD display. Whether you’re binge-watching your favorite shows or scrolling through social media, the 720x1600 resolution combined with a 120Hz refresh rate makes your experience fluid and immersive. Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 SpecificationsNETWORKTechnology GSM / CDMA / HSPA / CDMA2000 / LTE / 5G2G bands GSM 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 – SIM 1 & SIM 2CDMA 8003G bands HSDPA 850 / 900 / 2100 – ChinaCDMA2000 1x4G bands 1, 3, 5, 8, 34, 38, 39, 40, 41 – China5G bands 1, 5, 8, 28, 41, 78 SA/NSA – ChinaSpeed HSPA, LTE, 5GLAUNCHAnnounced 2024, September 26Status AvailableBODYDimensions 162.4 x 75.7 x 8 mm (6.39 x 2.98 x 0.31 in)Weight 190 g (6.70 oz)SIM Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by)IP64, dust and water resistantDISPLAYType OLED, 120Hz, HDR10+, 2100 nits (peak)Size 6.67 inches, 107.4 cm2 (~87.4% screen-to-body ratio)Resolution 1080 x 2400 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~395 ppi density)Protection Corning Gorilla Glass 5Always-on displayPLATFORMOS Android 14, HyperOSChipset Mediatek Dimensity 7025 Ultra (6 nm)CPU Octa-core (2×2.5 GHz Cortex-A78 & 6×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55)GPU IMG BXM-8-256MEMORYCard slot UnspecifiedInternal 128GB 6GB RAM, 128GB 8GB RAM, 256GB 8GB RAM, 256GB 12GB RAMUFS 2.2MAIN CAMERADual 50 MP, f/1.5, (wide), 1/1.96″, 0.8µm, PDAF, OIS 2 MP, f/2.4, (macro)Features LED flash, HDR, panoramaVideo 1080p@30fpsSELFIE CAMERASingle 16 MPVideo 1080p@30fpsSOUNDLoudspeaker Yes, with stereo speakers3.5mm jack Yes24-bit/192kHz Hi-Res audioCOMMUNICATIONSWLAN Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi DirectBluetooth 5.3, A2DP, LEGPS GPS, GLONASS, BDS, GALILEOInfrared port YesNFC UnspecifiedRadio UnspecifiedUSB USB Type-C 2.0FEATURESSensors Fingerprint (side-mounted), accelerometer, compassVirtual proximity sensingBATTERYType 5110 mAh, non-removableCharging 45W wiredMISCELLANEOUSColors Black, White, Green Redmi Note 14 Review DetailsXiaomi Redmi Note 14 5G is a smartphone that runs on Android 14. It was released on 2024, September 26. Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 has 6.67 inch, OLED, 120Hz, HDR10+, 2100 nits (peak), a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels screen with Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 uses Mediatek Dimensity 7025 Ultra (6 nm) chipset, Octa-core (2×2.5 GHz Cortex-A78 & 6×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU, IMG BXM-8-256 GPU. It supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). It has 5MP Dual main camera, 16MP Single selfie camera. Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 uses 5110 mAh, non-removable battery.Design and DisplayThe core design of both phones remains the same, however, the Redmi has given the Note 14 5G enough tweaks to be visually distinguishable. The camera cutout has grown larger, while the back panel has gone back to being curved. Similarly, the camera island has gone a bit softer with the edge, and the LED flash has shifted a couple of millimetres. The phone offers an added level of durability with an IP64 rating, reinforced internal design, and a Corning Gorilla Glass 5 protection.On the front, it has a 6.67-inch OLED screen with FHD+ resolution. It offers a refresh rate of up to 120Hz and a peak brightness of 2,100 nits. You also get a standard and instantaneous touch sampling rate of 240Hz and 2,160Hz respectively. The display is capable of HDR10+ and covers the DCI-P3 colour gamut. Moreover, it has received TÜV and SGS certifications for eye care features like low blue light.Network:The phone has supported 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G Network facilities. Moreover, GPRS and EDGE facilities also have. HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, 5G speed on the phone.PerformanceThe MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra serves as the brain of the Redmi Note 14 5G. With 6nm fabrication and a higher 2.5GHz clock speed, this chipset offers a decent upgrade over the Dimensity 6080 on its predecessor. Furthermore, the phone is available in four configurations: 6GB + 128GB, 8GB + 128GB, 8GB + 256GB, and 12GB + 256GB. For battery, it has a sizable 5,110 mAh cell with 45W charging support.Camera and the restThe primary shooter on the Redmi Note 14 5G is a 50MP OIS-enabled lens coupled with a Sony LYT-600 sensor. While the resolution on the newer phone drops by half compared to its predecessor, the higher-quality Sony sensor should make up for any possible compromise. Additionally, there is a 2MP auxiliary lens helping out with depth detection and bokeh effect. It barely adds to the photography experience though. Meanwhile, a 16MP camera sits on the front for selfies and face scanning.Connectivity-wise, you get dual-SIM support with 5G cellular, dual-band WiFi 5, and Bluetooth v5.3 for wireless medium. On the other hand, a USB Type-C port and a 3.5mm headphone jack handle the wired connections. For additional security, there is an in-display fingerprint sensor. The company also mentions “Heart rate detection” as a feature on this phone, but refuses to elaborate any further. It was released on 2024, September 26. Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 has 6.67 inch, OLED, 120Hz, HDR10+, 2100 nits (peak), a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels screen with Corning Gorilla Glass 5. Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 uses Mediatek Dimensity 7025 Ultra (6 nm) chipset, Octa-core (2×2.5 GHz Cortex-A78 & 6×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU, IMG BXM-8-256 GPU. It supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). It has 5MP Dual main camera, 16MP Single selfie camera. Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 uses 5110 mAh, non-removable battery.Design and DisplayThe core design of both phones remains the same, however, the Redmi has given the Note 14 5G enough tweaks to be visually distinguishable. The camera cutout has grown larger, while the back panel has gone back to being curved. Similarly, the camera island has gone a bit softer with the edge, and the LED flash has shifted a couple of millimetres. The phone offers an added level of durability with an IP64 rating, reinforced internal design, and a Corning Gorilla Glass 5 protection.On the front, it has a 6.67-inch OLED screen with FHD+ resolution. It offers a refresh rate of up to 120Hz and a peak brightness of 2,100 nits. You also get a standard and instantaneous touch sampling rate of 240Hz and 2,160Hz respectively. The display is capable of HDR10+ and covers the DCI-P3 colour gamut. Moreover, it has received TÜV and SGS certifications for eye care features like low blue light.Network:The phone has supported 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G Network facilities. Moreover, GPRS and EDGE facilities also have. HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, 5G speed on the phone.PerformanceThe MediaTek Dimensity 7025 Ultra serves as the brain of the Redmi Note 14 5G. With 6nm fabrication and a higher 2.5GHz clock speed, this chipset offers a decent upgrade over the Dimensity 6080 on its predecessor. Furthermore, the phone is available in four configurations: 6GB + 128GB, 8GB + 128GB, 8GB + 256GB, and 12GB + 256GB. For battery, it has a sizable 5,110 mAh cell with 45W charging support.Camera and the restThe primary shooter on the Redmi Note 14 5G is a 50MP OIS-enabled lens coupled with a Sony LYT-600 sensor. While the resolution on the newer phone drops by half compared to its predecessor, the higher-quality Sony sensor should make up for any possible compromise. Additionally, there is a 2MP auxiliary lens helping out with depth detection and bokeh effect. It barely adds to the photography experience though. Meanwhile, a 16MP camera sits on the front for selfies and face scanning.Connectivity-wise, you get dual-SIM support with 5G cellular, dual-band WiFi 5, and Bluetooth v5.3 for wireless medium. On the other hand, a USB Type-C port and a 3.5mm headphone jack handle the wired connections. For additional security, there is an in-display fingerprint sensor. The company also mentions “Heart rate detection” as a feature on this phone, but refuses to elaborate any further. Powered by the Snapdragon 695 chipset with options for 8GB RAM and either 128GB or 256GB storage, it runs on Android 14 with OxygenOS 14. The phone boasts a 50 MP main camera with OIS, a 2 MP depth camera, and a 16 MP front camera. It houses a 5500 mAh battery with 80W wired charging, stereo speakers, and a 3.5mm headphone jack.Design and DisplayThe new OnePlus Nord CE 4 Lite measures 8.1 mm in thickness and weighs 191 grams. It features a glass front, plastic frame, and plastic back. Additionally, it is IP54 rated, making it dust and splash-resistant. The device is available in three colors: Super Silver, Mega Blue, and Ultra Orange.The Nord CE 4 Lite comes with a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and a peak brightness level of 2100 nits. In addition, the display resolution is 1080 x 2400 pixels, providing approximately 395 ppi density.Performance and Operating SystemThe OnePlus Nord CE 4 Lite operates on Android 14 with OxygenOS 14. Although it was rumored to house the Snapdragon 6s Gen 3, it now features the Snapdragon 695 chipset housing an Adreno 619 GPU. Moreover, there are two memory variants available: 8GB RAM with 128GB storage and 8GB RAM with 256GB storage.Camera The main camera setup of the Nord CE4 Lite includes a 50 MP Sony LYT600 sensor with OIS and a 2 MP depth camera. This dual-camera system records video at 1080p@30fps with gyro-EIS. The front camera is a 16 MP sensor, also supporting 1080p@30fps video recording with gyro-EIS.Battery and ChargingThe OnePlus Nord CE 4 Lite has a 5500 mAh non-removable battery. It supports 80W wired charging, capable of charging from 1-100% in 52 minutes, as advertised. Additionally, it features 5W reverse wired charging. In addition, the device is equipped with stereo speakers and a 3.5mm headphone jack. However, it does not support NFC. Whether you're scrolling through your favorite apps or watching videos, the 120Hz refresh rate makes everything feel buttery smooth and ultra-responsive. The vibrant HD+ resolution ensures sharp details and vibrant colors, perfect for entertainment on the go.Reliable Performance with Smart Processing PowerPowered by the T7250 chipset and backed by 4GB RAM and 64GB ROM, the TECNO SPARK Go 2 offers solid performance for multitasking, gaming, and everyday browsing. From music and videos to calls and notifications, every sound is clearer, louder, and more immersive. It's an excellent choice for users who enjoy a rich audio experience on their smartphones.

For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. iPhone 16 Pro Price in BangladeshThe latest iPhone 16 Pro pre order price in Bangladesh is 10,000 BDT (Desert Titanium | 128GB). You can pre order the iPhone 16 Pro at the lowest price from Sumsah Tech. The iPhone 16 Pro is proudly branded by Apple. To buy more Apple items, visit our website and find the Apple brand.Apple iPhone 16 ProThe Apple iPhone 16 Pro is one of the most talked-about smartphones of the year, and for good reason. With groundbreaking features, a stunning design, and the promise of the best camera Apple phone has ever produced, it’s set to be a game-changer. But what makes this phone stand out from its predecessors and competitors? Let’s dive deep into what the iPhone 16 Pro offers, especially for those in Bangladesh looking to get their hands on this flagship device.Apple iPhone 16 Pro: A New Era of SmartphonesThe Apple iPhone 16 Pro isn’t just another smartphone; it’s a glimpse into the future of mobile technology. Apple has once again raised the bar by introducing features that set it apart from the crowd. From an upgraded camera system to enhanced processing power, the iPhone 16 Pro is built to impress.Design and Build QualityOne of the first things you’ll notice about the iPhone 16 Pro is its sleek and premium design. Apple has refined the aesthetics with a new range of colors, including Midnight Black, Alpine Blue, and the classic Gold. The device boasts a surgical-grade stainless steel frame, which not only adds to its durability but also gives it a sophisticated look.Display: The Best Apple Has to OfferThe iPhone 16 Pro features a stunning 6.7-inch OLED display that brings every image, video, and graphic to life. The Super Retina XDR display is equipped with ProMotion technology, offering a smooth 120Hz refresh rate that makes every interaction feel buttery smooth. Whether you’re watching a movie or scrolling through your feed, the enhanced HDR capabilities ensure that colors are vivid and lifelike.Performance and ChipsetUnder the hood, the iPhone 16 Pro is powered by Apple’s latest A17 Bionic chip, making it one of the most powerful smartphones on the market. This chipset ensures lightning-fast performance, seamless multitasking, and improved energy efficiency. Whether you’re gaming, editing videos, or using multiple apps simultaneously, the iPhone 16 Pro handles it all with ease.Camera: The Best Camera Apple Phone YetApple has always been known for its camera quality, and the iPhone 16 Pro is no exception. It features a triple-camera setup with enhanced sensors and improved image processing. The main camera boasts a 48MP sensor, while the ultra-wide and telephoto lenses offer greater versatility. Whether you’re shooting in low light, capturing stunning landscapes, or filming 4K videos, the iPhone 16 Pro delivers professional-grade results.Battery Life and ChargingBattery life is always a crucial factor for smartphone users, and Apple has made significant improvements with the iPhone 16 Pro. The device is equipped with a larger battery that offers up to 20 hours of video playback on a single charge. Additionally, the iPhone 16 Pro supports fast charging and wireless charging, so you can power up quickly and efficiently.Software and User ExperienceThe iPhone 16 Pro runs on iOS 17, Apple’s latest operating system that brings a host of new features and improvements. With enhanced widgets, new customization options, and improved privacy controls, iOS 17 provides a user experience that’s smooth, intuitive, and secure.Connectivity and 5G CapabilitiesWith the iPhone 16 Pro, you’re not just getting a smartphone—you’re getting a future-proof device that’s built to support the latest connectivity standards. This software is designed to optimize performance and provide a smooth user experience. Anchoring the budget smartphone are 128GB 6GB RAM, 128GB 8GB RAM, and 256GB 8GB RAM internal storage variants—notably, this handset (your pic from the selection) supports MicroSD (shared SIM slot).Capture decent photos and 1080p pictures with the 108MP+2MP+2MP primary camera set up at the rear end of the phone and the 20MP front-end lens for selfies. The 4G-enabled handset has Bluetooth 5.3 for seamless and fast pairing with your other Bluetooth devices (smartwatch, Buds, TV, etc). For wifi, Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct offers quick and safe connectivity once connected to a reliable internet source. Besides Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, you can connect to other devices and transfer data using NFC, an Infrared port, and USB Type-C 2.0 OTG.The handset’s massive 5,500mAh battery enables at least 1.5 days of typical use before recharging. Recharge on the go with the fast 33W wired charger.

It was released in 2024, on May 31. Honor 200 has 6.7 inch, OLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, HDR, 4000 nits (peak), a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels screen. It uses Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) CPU, Adreno 720 GPU. Honor 200 supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). Honor 200 5G has 5MP Triple main camera, 5MP Single selfie camera. It uses 5200 mAh, non-removable battery.Display:6.7 inches OLED Capacitive Touchscreen, 1B colors supported punch hole display phone has a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels with a PPI of 436.Body and sensors:Made of a glass front, plastic frame, and plastic back, the mobile is 161.5 mm in height, 74.6 mm wide, and 7.7 mm in thickness. It weighs 187 g available. The mobile is available in 4 colors on the market. The colors are Black, Silver, Blue & Pink. Being a sensor accelerometer, gyro, compass, ultrasound proximity, and light sensor. The under-display, optical fingerprint runs quite accurately fast. Face unlock is correct & secured.Network:The phone has supported 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G Network facilities. Moreover, GPRS and EDGE facilities also have. HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, 5G speed on the phone.Performance:Android 14 Operating system and Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm), Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) processor on the phone.RAM and ROM:The company has launched the phone in 5 variants of 8GB/256GB, 12GB/256GB, 16GB/256GB, 12GB/512GB & 16GB/512GB. In the case of gaming, graphics, and RAM are fairly good. FHD-quality graphics games can be easily run and played quite smoothly.Camera:The Honor 200 is well-equipped in the camera department. The 50MP primary camera is coupled with the 1/1.56” Sony IMX906 sensor with OIS support. Moreover, it also houses a telephoto lens as well as an ultrawide/macro camera as auxiliary units. The former is a 50MP shooter with the Sony IMX856 sensor while the latter is a 12MP snapper. In the meantime, the front camera is also a 50MP unit.The Back of the phone has a 50MP+50MP+12MP camera with which you can record beautiful quality pictures and a maximum of 4k@30fps video. Moreover, it remains an extra feature like The phone has a 50MP selfie camera with which you can take beautiful quality pictures and selfies. You can record a maximum of 4k@30fps video with the front camera. High–quality selfie work can be done effortlessly with the camera on the phone.Battery:This phone packs a large 5,200 mAh battery with 100W wired charging support. The cell in the Honor 200 is the company’s silicon-carbon battery that offers a leading level of endurance. With this, you can get an average of up to 110 hours of standby time, and 13 hours of net browsing. At full charge, you can talk for up to 35 hours on 2G. The phone will take about 27 minutes with 100W supper fast charging to fully charge.

Before ordering if there is any confusion don't hesitate to contact the seller through chat. Please leave a review if you are satisfied with your purchase. For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. Samsung Galaxy A56 highlightsSamsung Galaxy A56 will be launched in March 2025. The Galaxy A56 launched with the model number unknown. Firstly, Its dimensional measure is 162.2 x 77.5 x 7.4 mm, and its weight is 198 grams. Secondly, the display of the Galaxy A56 is a 6.7-inch Super AMOLED panel with 1080 x 2340 pixels resolution. The display is protected from the Corning Gorilla Glass Victus+. Thirdly and most importantly, it is powered by the Exynos 1580 (4 nm) and runs on Android 15. Moreover, it has up to an Octa-core (1×2.91 GHz & 3×2.6 GHz & 4×1.95 GHz) CPU.Samsung Galaxy A56 phone has a three-camera setup on the back. This formation comprises a 50MP wide, 12MP ultrawide, 5MP macro camera. It has a 32MP selfie camera inside the notch of the display. The video recording capability is 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60fps, gyro-EIS. According to its RAM and ROM, It has two (8/12GB/128/56GB) variants. On the other hand, it can support up to microSDXC using a dedicated slot. Certainly, Galaxy A56 has a 5000mAh battery with 45W fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, Galaxy A56 is 2G/3G/4G/5G supportable. The fingerprint sensor is under the display.On the other hand, there is WLAN, Bluetooth, and USB port among the other features.

non-removableCharging45W wired, PD3.0MISCELLANEOUSColorsBlack, White, Purple, Green Redmi Note 14 Pro Review DetailsXiaomi Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G is a smartphone that runs on Android 14. It was released on 2024, September 26. Redmi Note 14 Pro has 6.67 inch, AMOLED, 68B colors, 120Hz, HDR10+, Dolby Vision, 3000 nits (peak), a resolution of 1220 x 2712 pixels screen with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2. Note 14 Pro uses Mediatek Dimensity 7300 Ultra (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (4×2.5 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU, Mali-G615 MC2 GPU. It supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Nano-SIM, eSIM or Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). Redmi Note 14 Pro has 5MP Triple main camera, 2MP Single selfie camera. It uses 5500 mAh, non-removable battery.Design and DisplayRight from the get-go, it is pretty clear that Redmi Note 14 Pro is trying to emulate what the higher-end Note offering did last year. Among the available designs, a single purple colour option sticks out the most with a vegan leather finish — similar to the Note 13 Pro+! Additionally, the phone comes with IP68 water and dust resistance — pretty reminiscent of you know which phone. It also dons a Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2 on the front adding to its toughness. The overall design has been overhauled with a reshaped and relocated camera island.We are getting a 6.67-inch 12-bit OLED screen with 1.5K resolution on this phone. Moreover, it is capable of up to 120Hz refresh rate, 3,000 nits peak brightness, and 480Hz touch sampling rate. In the meantime, the instantaneous touch sampling rate on the Redmi Note 14 Pro is much higher at 2,560Hz. Not only that, it also offers wet hands touch support, 1,920Hz PWM dimming, DCI-P3 colour gamut, HDR10+ and has a triple certification from TÜV Rheinland for eye protection features.PerformanceAlong with the aesthetic, the Redmi Note 14 Pro gets an upgrade on the performance side of things as well. Firstly, the new phone houses the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra, which is decently better than the Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 on its predecessor. It is also available in wider configurations, those being: 8GB + 128GB, 8GB + 256GB, 12GB + 256GB, and 12GB + 512GB. Likewise, the battery has beefed up to 5,500 mAh compared to 5,100 mAh last year. However, the charging speed has dropped to 45W from 67W, which is still plenty fast.Camera and the restThe camera department gets some adjustments too. Instead of going for a big 200MP sensor, Xiaomi has kept it simple with a 50MP shooter. The sensor size has shrunken too, with a 1/1.96-inch unit this time, while previously there was a much larger 1/1.4-inch sensor. It is a LYT-600 sensor from Sony though, which is also present on the Redmi Note 14 5G. While the camera appears to be a downgrade on paper, we can only tell for certain once we test it hands-on. Other than that, the auxiliary lenses remain unchanged with an 8MP ultrawide and a 2MP macro shooter. Meanwhile, the selfie snapper is now a 20MP unit instead of the 16MP on the previous iteration.The Redmi Note 14 Pro supports dual SIM 5G cellular and dual-band WiFi 6 connectivity. Furthermore, you get Bluetooth v5.4 alongside high-quality codecs like LDAC and LHDC-V. There is also NFC, five-way navigation support and IR blaster as additional wireless connectivity options. Other than that, there is a stereo speaker setup and an X-axis linear motor to enhance the gaming and multimedia experience.

details.description_text: The Honor X9c is a durable smartphone with many features built into this device which makes it very capable of delivering good performance. It has a large 6.78 inches AMOLED display with a 1224 x 2700 pixels screen resolution and 120Hz refresh rate. The phone is running on Qualcomm SM5350-AB Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset. Honor X9c has a main camera of 108MP with OIS and 5MP ultra-wide lens.The front facing camera is a 16MP wide lens. These include a 6,600mAh battery charging capability which is fast charging at 66W. Also, the Honor X9c offers the dust and water resistance rating of IP65M. It comes in three colors: Three models: Jade Cyan, Titanium Black, and Titanium Purple. The Honor X9c price in Bangladesh is BDT 44,999 (Official) for 12GB of RAM and 256GB of phone storage.Honor X9c The Honor X9c is a durable smartphone with many features built into this device which makes it very capable of delivering good performance. The Honor X5b Plus is an affordable, high-performance smartphone offering a sleek design, advanced camera system, and reliable battery life, making it a fantastic choice for users seeking excellent value for money.Sleek Design and BuildThe Honor X5b Plus is designed for style and durability. With dimensions of 163.32 x 75.07 x 8.35 mm and a weight of approximately 188g, this phone provides a comfortable and solid feel. It features a glass front, plastic back, and plastic frame. The IP64 rating ensures it is dust and water-resistant, adding extra durability for everyday use.Immersive DisplayEnjoy vibrant visuals with the 6.56-inch TFT LCD display that supports 16.7 million colors and a 90Hz refresh rate. The screen offers a resolution of 720 x 1612 pixels, delivering crisp and clear images. The water drop screen design ensures an immersive viewing experience, perfect for watching videos, browsing, and gaming.Efficient PerformancePowered by the MediaTek Helio G36 chipset, the Honor X5b Plus ensures smooth multitasking and efficient performance. Its Octa-core CPU (4x Cortex-A53 up to 2.2GHz and 4x Cortex-A53 up to 1.6GHz) and IMG GE8320 GPU deliver impressive results for everyday tasks and light gaming. It runs on MagicOS 7.1, based on Android 13, offering a smooth, user-friendly interface.Ample Storage OptionsThe Honor X5b Plus comes with 4GB RAM and 64GB internal storage, offering sufficient space for apps, photos, and videos. If you need more space, the phone also supports microSDXC storage expansion, allowing you to store more content with ease.Advanced Camera SystemThe 50 MP main camera with an f/1.8 aperture delivers sharp and vibrant photos. It also features a depth camera with an f/2.4 aperture to add depth to your shots. The LED flash and panorama mode enhance your photography experience in various lighting conditions.Selfie Camera: The 5 MP front camera with an f/2.2 aperture ensures clear selfies and supports video calls with ease. Both cameras support 1080p video recording at 30fps, so you can capture your favorite moments effortlessly.Long-lasting BatteryThe 5200 mAh battery offers extended usage throughout the day, whether you are streaming, gaming, or working. With 5V/2A standard charging, the Honor X5b Plus offers efficient recharging to keep you powered up.Seamless Connectivity and FeaturesThe Honor X5b Plus supports Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 5.1, and USB Type-C 2.0, ensuring smooth connectivity for all your devices. The OTG feature allows you to connect external devices, while GPS/AGPS/GLONASS/BeiDou/Galileo support ensures precise positioning for navigation. The phone also features NFC for seamless payments, though it’s only available on the WOD-LX1 variant.

The water drop screen design ensures an immersive viewing experience, perfect for watching videos, browsing, and gaming.Efficient PerformancePowered by the MediaTek Helio G36 chipset, the Honor X5b Plus ensures smooth multitasking and efficient performance. Its Octa-core CPU (4x Cortex-A53 up to 2.2GHz and 4x Cortex-A53 up to 1.6GHz) and IMG GE8320 GPU deliver impressive results for everyday tasks and light gaming. It runs on MagicOS 7.1, based on Android 13, offering a smooth, user-friendly interface.Ample Storage OptionsThe Honor X5b Plus comes with 4GB RAM and 64GB internal storage, offering sufficient space for apps, photos, and videos. If you need more space, the phone also supports microSDXC storage expansion, allowing you to store more content with ease.Advanced Camera SystemThe 50 MP main camera with an f/1.8 aperture delivers sharp and vibrant photos. It also features a depth camera with an f/2.4 aperture to add depth to your shots. The LED flash and panorama mode enhance your photography experience in various lighting conditions.Selfie Camera: The 5 MP front camera with an f/2.2 aperture ensures clear selfies and supports video calls with ease. Both cameras support 1080p video recording at 30fps, so you can capture your favorite moments effortlessly.Long-lasting BatteryThe 5200 mAh battery offers extended usage throughout the day, whether you are streaming, gaming, or working. With 5V/2A standard charging, the Honor X5b Plus offers efficient recharging to keep you powered up.Seamless Connectivity and FeaturesThe Honor X5b Plus supports Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 5.1, and USB Type-C 2.0, ensuring smooth connectivity for all your devices. The OTG feature allows you to connect external devices, while GPS/AGPS/GLONASS/BeiDou/Galileo support ensures precise positioning for navigation. The phone also features NFC for seamless payments, though it’s only available on the WOD-LX1 variant.

To buy more Apple items, visit our website and find the Apple brand.Apple iPhone 16 Pro MaxApple’s latest flagship, the iPhone 16 Pro Max, has taken the smartphone world by storm. With unmatched features, an advanced camera system, and cutting-edge performance, the iPhone 16 Pro Max is a device that’s hard to ignore. For tech enthusiasts in Bangladesh, the big question is: what’s the price of this premium device, and is it worth the investment? Let’s explore everything you need to know about the iPhone 16 Pro Max, including its features, pricing, and where you can buy it in Bangladesh.The iPhone 16 Pro Max is not just another smartphone; it’s a statement of luxury and innovation. Apple has once again pushed the boundaries of what a smartphone can do, integrating powerful new features and sleek design upgrades that make this model stand out. From the best camera Apple phone yet to exceptional battery life, the iPhone 16 Pro Max is a powerhouse.Design and Build QualityApple has maintained its reputation for stunning designs with the iPhone 16 Pro Max. The device features a robust build with a surgical-grade stainless steel frame and a ceramic shield front cover that enhances durability. Available in a new array of colors, including Deep Blue, Graphite, and Silver, it offers a sophisticated look that appeals to style-conscious consumers.Display: Bigger, Brighter, and BetterThe iPhone 16 Pro Max boasts a massive 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR display, making it the largest screen Apple has ever put on an iPhone. The OLED technology provides stunning color accuracy and true blacks, enhancing the viewing experience. With ProMotion technology, the display supports a 120Hz refresh rate, delivering silky-smooth visuals, whether you’re gaming, scrolling, or watching videos.Performance and ChipsetPowered by the A17 Bionic chip, the iPhone 16 Pro Max offers unmatched performance. This latest chipset is designed to handle the most demanding tasks with ease, from high-end gaming to video editing. The upgraded 5-core GPU ensures better graphics performance, while the improved CPU efficiency means you can expect longer battery life even under heavy usage.Camera: The Best Camera Apple Phone to DateOne of the standout features of the iPhone 16 Pro Max is its advanced camera system. The triple-camera setup includes a 48MP main sensor, a 12MP ultra-wide lens, and a 12MP telephoto lens, allowing for stunning photography and videography. Enhanced low-light performance, improved optical zoom, and new ProRAW capabilities make it the best camera Apple phone for photographers and content creators alike.Battery Life and ChargingThe iPhone 16 Pro Max doesn’t just perform well; it lasts longer too. With a larger battery compared to its predecessor, the device offers up to 25 hours of video playback on a single charge. Fast charging is supported, allowing you to juice up 50% of the battery in just 30 minutes, while the MagSafe technology provides convenient wireless charging options.Software and User ExperienceRunning on iOS 17, the iPhone 16 Pro Max offers a seamless and intuitive user experience. New features like improved widgets, enhanced multitasking, and a more customizable home screen make the software feel fresh and user-friendly. Apple continues to prioritize privacy and security, ensuring your data is protected at all times.Connectivity and 5G SupportConnectivity is one area where the iPhone 16 Pro Max truly shines. The device supports the latest 5G technology, providing faster download speeds, better streaming quality, and lower latency. Whether you’re at home, in the office, or on the go, the iPhone 16 Pro Max ensures you stay connected at lightning speed.Security FeaturesApple continues to lead the way in smartphone security, and the iPhone 16 Pro Max is no exception. Equipped with Face ID, advanced encryption, and enhanced privacy settings, the device keeps your data secure from threats. New privacy features in iOS 17 give you more control over your data than ever before.Where to Buy the iPhone 16 Pro Max in BangladeshWhen it comes to purchasing the iPhone 16 Pro Max in Bangladesh, it’s crucial to buy from trusted sources to ensure you’re getting a genuine product. Sumash Tech, known as an authentic mobile, laptop, and gadget shop, is one of the best places to purchase your new iPhone. They offer genuine Apple products with official warranties, giving you peace of mind with your purchase.You can also find the iPhone 16 Pro Max at other authorized Apple retailers across the country, as well as on popular online marketplaces. Be sure to check for availability and current prices as they can vary based on demand.Is the iPhone 16 Pro Max Worth the Price?The iPhone 16 Pro Max comes with a premium price tag, but it also delivers a premium experience. From its outstanding camera quality to its powerful performance and luxurious design, it offers a level of sophistication that’s hard to beat. If you’re an Apple fan or someone looking for the best camera Apple phone on the market, the iPhone 16 Pro Max is well worth considering.ConclusionThe iPhone 16 Pro Max represents the pinnacle of smartphone innovation, blending cutting-edge technology with Apple’s signature design and build quality. Whether you’re capturing stunning photos, enjoying a seamless gaming experience, or staying connected on the go, this device delivers on all fronts. For those in Bangladesh looking to invest in a high-end smartphone, the iPhone 16 Pro Max is an excellent choice.

For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. iPhone 17 Pro MaxThe iPhone 17 Pro Max represents the pinnacle of Apple’s innovation, combining cutting-edge performance, advanced camera technology, and refined design into a single flagship device. Built with precision, it features a Ceramic Shield 2 front and an aluminum alloy frame, ensuring durability while maintaining a premium feel. With its expansive 6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display, users experience breathtaking visuals, vibrant colors, and smooth 120Hz refresh rates, making it ideal for everything from professional content creation to immersive entertainment.Powered by the new Apple A19 Pro chipset built on 3nm architecture, the iPhone 17 Pro Max delivers unparalleled speed, efficiency, and graphics performance. Coupled with up to 12GB of RAM and storage options up to 2TB, it is designed to handle professional-grade workflows and demanding applications effortlessly. The device also features an improved battery system with fast wired and wireless charging support, ensuring power is always within reach.Photography and videography enthusiasts will appreciate the triple 48MP camera system with wide, ultrawide, and periscope telephoto lenses, offering up to 4x optical zoom and professional-level stabilization. Combined with ProRes, ProRes RAW, Apple Log 2, and Dolby Vision HDR support, the iPhone 17 Pro Max is a powerhouse for both creators and everyday users who demand cinematic quality. The 18MP selfie camera with advanced 3D depth sensing further enhances portraits and video calls, supported by Apple’s spatial audio technology.Connectivity reaches new heights with 5G SA/NSA, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, and satellite-based features for emergency messaging and location services. The device is IP68 certified for water and dust resistance, making it reliable in all environments. Available in Silver, Cosmic Orange, and Deep Blue, the iPhone 17 Pro Max combines elegance with next-generation performance.Key Features:6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display with 3000 nits peak brightnessApple A19 Pro chipset (3nm) with 12GB RAM and up to 2TB storageTriple 48MP Pro camera system with periscope telephoto and LiDAR scannerProfessional-grade video: ProRes, ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, Apple Log 218MP front camera with 3D depth sensing and spatial audio supportAdvanced connectivity: 5G SA/NSA/Sub-6, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, UWB Gen2Durable design with Ceramic Shield 2 and IP68 water resistanceLong-lasting battery with 50% charge in 20 minutes (wired) or 30 minutes (wireless)Satellite-based SOS, messaging, and Find My support

details.description_text: Display: 6.88 inch | IPS LCD Processor : Unisoc T7250 Camera : 32+0.08MP + 8.0 MP Features: Side-mounted fingerprint Sensor SpecificationDisplaySize6.88 inchTypeIPS LCDResolution720 x 1640 pixelsRefresh Rate120 HzProcessorChipsetUnisoc T7250CPU TypeOcta-core (2×1.8 GHz Cortex-A75 & 6×1.6 GHz Cortex-A55)CPU Speed1.8 GHzGPUMali-G57 MP1MemoryRAM6GBROM128GBRear CameraResolution32+0.08MPFront CameraResolution8MPNetwork & AMP; ConnectivitySIMNano-SIMNetwork2G, 3G, 4GBatteryTypeLi-Po 5200mAhFast Charging15W First ChargingWarranty InformationWarranty12 MonthDescriptionRedmi A5 (6/128GB)The Redmi A5 (6/128GB) is the perfect smartphone for those who want a great combination of performance and affordability. With a massive 6.88-inch display, smooth 120Hz refresh rate, and a powerful 6GB RAM, this phone ensures an optimal experience for everyday tasks, gaming, and media consumption. Whether you’re browsing, taking photos, or streaming, the Redmi A5 gives you everything you need without breaking the bank. Available now at Gadget & Gear in Bangladesh, this phone is a solid choice for budget-conscious users who don’t want to compromise on quality.Key Features of Redmi A5The Redmi A5 offers an array of features that are designed to provide value while maintaining a sleek and functional design. Let’s explore some of the top reasons why this phone is the right choice for you.Massive DisplayThe large 6.88-inch IPS LCD display on the Redmi A5 is one of its standout features. Whether you're watching your favorite shows, scrolling through social media, or playing games, the vibrant display brings content to life. With a resolution of 720 x 1640 pixels, the screen delivers decent clarity, and the 120Hz refresh rate ensures that scrolling and navigating through apps is incredibly smooth. Perfect for those who love a large screen experience without the high price tag.Reliable PerformancePowered by the Unisoc T7250 chipset, the Redmi A5 handles day-to-day tasks effortlessly. With an octa-core processor (2×1.8 GHz Cortex-A75 & 6×1.6 GHz Cortex-A55) and a Mali-G57 MP1 GPU, it delivers a solid performance for gaming, multitasking, and multimedia consumption. Whether you're running apps or playing light games, you won’t face significant lag. With 6GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage, you’ll have enough space and memory to store your files, apps, and media.Dual Rear Camera for Stunning PhotosThe Redmi A5 comes with a 32MP main camera and a secondary 0.08MP sensor, allowing you to take vibrant and detailed photos with ease. Whether you're capturing landscapes, close-up shots, or portraits, this camera system gives you the versatility you need. The 8MP front camera ensures sharp and clear selfies for all your social media posts or video calls. With these powerful camera features, the Redmi A5 allows you to capture your memories in crisp detail.Impressive Battery LifeThe Redmi A5 is equipped with a long-lasting 5200mAh battery, meaning you can enjoy extended usage without constantly worrying about recharging. Whether you're watching videos, browsing, or chatting, the phone provides reliable battery life throughout the day. And when it’s time to recharge, the 15W fast charging feature ensures that you get back to using your phone in no time. Stay productive and connected with ease.

And when it’s time to recharge, the 15W fast charging feature ensures that you get back to using your phone in no time. Stay productive and connected with ease.

details.description_text: Display: 6.67” HD+ IPS Punch Hole Sunlight Display, 120Hz refresh rate, 700 nits brightness Processor: MediaTek Helio G81 Octa-Core RAM/Storage: 4GB RAM, 128GB ROM Rear Camera: 13MP Front Camera: 8MP Battery: 6000mAh with 18W fast charging Operating System: Android 15 Audio: DTS Dual Stereo Speakers Build: IP64 dust & water resistance, 1.5M drop resistance Security: Side-mounted fingerprint sensor Extras: IR Remote Control, Dual SIM, USB Type-C TECNO Spark 40C (4/128GB)The TECNO Spark 40C (4/128GB) is built to impress, combining style, speed, and standout specs that make everyday use feel extraordinary. Available now at Gadget & Gear, this device is tailored for users who demand smooth multitasking, vibrant visuals, and reliable performance all packed into one sleek design. Unlock your phone in a flash with the side-mounted fingerprint sensor for secure, convenient access. Control your home appliances with the built-in IR remote control, and enjoy the latest OS with Android 15, giving you smoother UI, better privacy features, and improved app optimization.TECNO Spark 40C SpecificationThe TECNO Spark 40C comes with a spacious 6.67-inch HD+ IPS Punch Hole Display that turns every scroll, swipe, or stream into a visually engaging experience. With a 120Hz refresh rate, transitions feel silky-smooth, whether you're gaming, watching content, or browsing social media. Plus, the 700 nits peak brightness ensures your screen stays perfectly visible, even under direct sunlight.Display: 6.67” HD+ IPS Punch Hole Sunlight Display, 120Hz refresh rate, 700 nits brightnessProcessor: MediaTek Helio G81 Octa-CoreRAM/Storage: 4GB RAM, 128GB ROMRear Camera: 13MPFront Camera: 8MPBattery: 6000mAh with 18W fast chargingOperating System: Android 15Audio: DTS Dual Stereo SpeakersBuild: IP64 dust & water resistance, 1.5M drop resistanceSecurity: Side-mounted fingerprint sensorExtras: IR Remote Control, Dual SIM, USB Type-CPowered by PerformanceUnder the hood, the Helio G81 chipset ensures the Spark 40C handles daily tasks with ease. Whether you’re multitasking, switching between apps, or playing light to mid-range games, the Octa-Core CPU delivers responsive and energy-efficient performance. Paired with 4GB RAM and 128GB internal storage, you get the space and speed you need without compromise.Reliable CamerasThe 13MP rear camera is designed to help you shoot clear and vibrant photos, even in tricky lighting. Flip to the front and the 8MP selfie camera makes sure your video calls and selfies are always Instagram-worthy. Whether it's daytime or evening, the camera system is optimized for social sharing and daily snaps.Battery with Fast ChargingBattery life is one of the strongest points of the TECNO Spark 40C. With a 6000mAh battery, you’re covered for long workdays, video calls, streaming sessions, and everything in between. And when it's time to recharge, the 18W fast charging via USB Type-C helps you get back on the move quickly.Speakers & Drop ResistanceEnjoy an immersive sound experience with DTS Dual Stereo Speakers, offering crisp audio whether you’re watching a movie, gaming, or just listening to music. This isn’t just loud—it’s rich, clear, and dynamic. The TECNO Spark 40C is not just smart it’s tough. With IP64 dust and water resistance, and a 1.5m drop resistance, you get peace of mind even in unpredictable situations. It’s built to keep up with your lifestyle.

For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. iPhone 17 Pro Full DescriptionThe iPhone 17 Pro represents the pinnacle of Apple’s innovation, bringing together elegant design, cutting-edge performance, and advanced camera technology. Crafted with a refined aluminum alloy frame and protected by the new Ceramic Shield 2, it combines strength and sophistication while remaining slim and lightweight. With 5G support across global bands, ultra-fast performance from the Apple A19 Pro chip, and breakthrough imaging capabilities, the iPhone 17 Pro is built for those who demand the very best.OverviewThe 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display delivers breathtaking visuals with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, Dolby Vision, and peak brightness up to 3000 nits for unmatched clarity even under direct sunlight. Powered by iOS 26 and the 3nm Apple A19 Pro chipset, it ensures smooth multitasking, console-level gaming, and professional-grade editing on the go. Storage options range up to 1TB, paired with 12GB RAM, providing ample space and seamless performance for both everyday use and demanding workflows.Photography and videography reach new heights with the advanced triple 48MP camera system, featuring wide, ultrawide, and periscope telephoto lenses with up to 4x optical zoom. The addition of a TOF 3D LiDAR scanner enhances depth mapping and low-light performance, while video recording supports 4K up to 120fps, ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, Apple Log 2, and even immersive 3D spatial video. The front-facing 18MP multi-aspect camera with OIS and ProRes support ensures professional-quality selfies and video calls.The iPhone 17 Pro also introduces faster and more reliable connectivity, supporting Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, GPS with multi-band systems including NavIC, and emergency satellite communication. A robust battery ensures all-day power, supported by fast 50% charging in just 20 minutes with wired PD2.0 or 30 minutes with MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging.Key Features 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED with 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, and Dolby VisionApple A19 Pro chipset with 12GB RAM and up to 1TB storageTriple 48MP pro camera system with periscope telephoto and 3D LiDAR scanner18MP multi-aspect front camera with OIS, Dolby Vision HDR, and ProRes RAWAdvanced video capabilities including 4K 120fps, Apple Log 2, and spatial videoDual-SIM options with global 5G band support including mmWave (USA)Rugged build with Ceramic Shield 2, IP68 water resistance, and anti-reflective coatingWi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 with DisplayPort supportAll-day battery with fast wired and wireless charging, plus reverse wired chargingAvailable in Silver, Cosmic Orange, and Deep Blue

Motorola Edge 50 Fusion has 6.7 inch, P-OLED, 120Hz (LATAM), 144Hz (INT), 1600 nits (peak), a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels screen with Corning Gorilla Glass 5 – unconfirmed. It uses Qualcomm SM7435-AB Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 (4 nm) – International Qualcomm SM6450 Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 (4 nm) – LATAM chipset, Octa-core (4×2.40 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×1.95 GHz Cortex-A55) – International Octa-core (4×2.2 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×1.8 GHz Cortex-A55) – LATAM CPU, Adreno 710 GPU. It supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Nano-SIM, eSIM or Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). It has 5MP Dual main camera, 32MP Single selfie camera. It uses 5000 mAh, non-removable battery.Display:6.7 inches P-OLED capacitive Touchscreen, 1B colors supported punch-hole display phone has a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels, with a PPI of 393.Body and sensors:Made of the glass front, silicone polymer back (eco leather), and plastic frame. The mobile is available in 3 colors on the market. The colors are Forest Blue, Marshmallow Blue & Hot Pink. It is an accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass sensor. The under display, optical fingerprint runs quite accurately fast. Face unlock is correct & secured.Network:The phone has supported 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G Network facilities. Moreover, GPRS and EDGE facilities also have. HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, 5G speed on the phone.Performance:International:Android 14 Operating system and Qualcomm SM7435-AB Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 (4 nm), Octa-core (4×2.40 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×1.95 GHz Cortex-A55) processor on the phone.LATAM:Android 14 Operating system and Qualcomm SM6450 Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 (4 nm), Octa-core (4×2.2 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×1.8 GHz Cortex-A55) processor on the phone.RAM and ROM:The company has launched the phone in 4 variants of 8GB/128GB, 8GB/256GB, 12GB/256GB & 12GB/512GB. In the case of gaming, graphics, and RAM are fairly good. Full HD-quality graphics games can be easily run and played quite smoothly.Camera:The Back of the phone has a 50MP+13MP with which you can record beautiful quality pictures and a maximum of 4K@30fps video.On the front, a 32MP selfie camera with which you can take beautiful quality pictures and selfies. You can record a maximum of 1080@30fps video with the front camera. High–quality selfie work can be done effortlessly with the camera on the phone.Battery:The Motorola Edge 50 Fusion mobile uses a non-removable Li-Po 5000 mAh battery. With this you can get an average of up to 114 hours of standby time, and 15 hours of net browsing. At full charge, you can talk for up to 36 hours on 3G. The phone will take up to 35 minutes with 68W Fast charging to fully charge.

For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. iPhone 17 Pro MaxThe iPhone 17 Pro Max represents the pinnacle of Apple’s innovation, combining cutting-edge performance, advanced camera technology, and refined design into a single flagship device. Built with precision, it features a Ceramic Shield 2 front and an aluminum alloy frame, ensuring durability while maintaining a premium feel. With its expansive 6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display, users experience breathtaking visuals, vibrant colors, and smooth 120Hz refresh rates, making it ideal for everything from professional content creation to immersive entertainment.Powered by the new Apple A19 Pro chipset built on 3nm architecture, the iPhone 17 Pro Max delivers unparalleled speed, efficiency, and graphics performance. Coupled with up to 12GB of RAM and storage options up to 2TB, it is designed to handle professional-grade workflows and demanding applications effortlessly. The device also features an improved battery system with fast wired and wireless charging support, ensuring power is always within reach.Photography and videography enthusiasts will appreciate the triple 48MP camera system with wide, ultrawide, and periscope telephoto lenses, offering up to 4x optical zoom and professional-level stabilization. Combined with ProRes, ProRes RAW, Apple Log 2, and Dolby Vision HDR support, the iPhone 17 Pro Max is a powerhouse for both creators and everyday users who demand cinematic quality. The 18MP selfie camera with advanced 3D depth sensing further enhances portraits and video calls, supported by Apple’s spatial audio technology.Connectivity reaches new heights with 5G SA/NSA, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, and satellite-based features for emergency messaging and location services. The device is IP68 certified for water and dust resistance, making it reliable in all environments. Available in Silver, Cosmic Orange, and Deep Blue, the iPhone 17 Pro Max combines elegance with next-generation performance.Key Features:6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display with 3000 nits peak brightnessApple A19 Pro chipset (3nm) with 12GB RAM and up to 2TB storageTriple 48MP Pro camera system with periscope telephoto and LiDAR scannerProfessional-grade video: ProRes, ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, Apple Log 218MP front camera with 3D depth sensing and spatial audio supportAdvanced connectivity: 5G SA/NSA/Sub-6, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, UWB Gen2Durable design with Ceramic Shield 2 and IP68 water resistanceLong-lasting battery with 50% charge in 20 minutes (wired) or 30 minutes (wireless)Satellite-based SOS, messaging, and Find My support

details.description_text: NO return is applicable if the seal is broken• 10-day seller replacement guarantee• No returns will be applicable in case of change of mind.• In Accidental Cases Mobile (Broken Display, Dent, Burn, Shock, Water Damage or Manual Update or Root) service Warranty or replacement guarantee will not be applicable• 0% EMI available. If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.OnePlus Nord 5 5G – SpecificationCategoryDetailsGeneralModelOnePlus Nord 5 5GBrandOnePlusNetworkGSM / HSPA / LTE / 5GSIMDual Nano-SIMDimensions163.4 × 77 × 8.1 mmWeight211 gBuildGlass front (Gorilla Glass 7i), Glass back, Plastic frameProtectionCorning Gorilla Glass 7i, IP65 dust and water resistantDisplayDisplay TypeSwift AMOLED, 1B colors, 144Hz refresh rate, 3840Hz PWM dimming, HDR10+Brightness800 nits (typ), 1400 nits (HBM), 1800 nits (peak)Display Size6.83 inchesDisplay Resolution1272 × 2800 pixelsPlatformOperating SystemAndroid 15, OxygenOS 15ChipsetQualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 (4 nm)CPUOcta-coreMemoryRAM & Storage Options256GB + 8GB RAM, 256GB + 12GB RAM, 512GB + 12GB RAMStorage TypeUFS 3.1Main CameraRear Cameras50 MP (Wide, OIS) + 8 MP (Ultrawide)FeaturesLED Flash, Ultra HDR, PanoramaVideo Recording4K@30/60fps, 1080p@30/60/120fps, gyro-EISSelfie CameraFront Camera50 MPFeaturesPanoramaVideo Recording4K@30/60fps, 1080p@30/60fps, gyro-EISSoundSpeakersStereo SpeakersBatteryCapacity6800 mAhCharging80W wired (100% in 54 min), 33W PPS, 18W PDExtra Features5W reverse wired, bypass chargingSensors & OthersSensorsFingerprint (under display, optical), Accelerometer, Gyro, Proximity, Compass, NFCOnePlus Nord 5 5GThe OnePlus Nord 5 5G is mid-range brilliance with flagship-level performance. Powered by the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chipset built on a 4nm process, it delivers lightning-fast speeds and desktop-class efficiency for gaming, streaming, and multitasking.Its dual 50MP Ultra-Clear camera system, featuring the premium LYT-700 sensor from the OnePlus 13 series, captures every shot with professional-grade clarity. With OIS stabilization, your photos and videos come out sharp, steady, and vibrant—whether it’s day or night.Up front, the massive 6.83-inch Swift AMOLED display offers an ultra-smooth 144Hz refresh rate and 3840Hz PWM dimming, reducing eye strain during extended viewing or gaming sessions. Backed by a 6800mAh battery, the Nord 5 5G powers through up to two days of heavy use, and when you need a recharge, 80W SuperVOOC fast charging gets you from 0–100% in just 54 minutes.Built tough with Gorilla Glass 7i protection and IP65 water resistance, this phone is made to last. It comes with up to 12GB RAM and UFS 3.1 storage, ensuring smooth multitasking and fast app loading. With blazing-fast 5G connectivity, dual SIM support, and advanced biometric security, the Nord 5 5G is the perfect balance of premium performance and everyday practicality—without the flagship price tag.Key Features – OnePlus Nord 5 5GFlagship-Level Photography – Dual 50MP Ultra-Clear cameras with LYT-700 sensor & OIS for pro-grade shotsImmersive Display – 6.83" Swift AMOLED with 144Hz refresh rate & 3840Hz PWM dimming for smooth, eye-friendly visualsAll-Day Battery Life – 6800mAh battery supports up to 2 days of use with 80W SuperVOOC fast charging (100% in 54 min)Cinematic Videos – Capture stunning, stabilized 4K content perfect for social media and vloggingCrystal-Clear Selfies & Calls – AI-optimized front camera for sharp selfies and video callsImmersive Sound – Rich, cinematic audio experience for movies, music, and gamingBlazing 5G Performance – Dual SIM 5G connectivity with Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 for unmatched speedSmart & Secure – Advanced biometric security with robust data encryption​​​​​​​

OPPO Reno13 F 4G (8/256GB)Introducing the OPPO Reno13 F 4G (8/256GB), a sleek and powerful smartphone that combines impressive technology with cutting-edge features. Whether you're a photography enthusiast, a gaming aficionado, or someone who simply loves a smooth user experience, this device has everything you need. Available at Gadget & Gear in Bangladesh, the OPPO Reno13 F 4G offers outstanding value and performance. Let's dive into its key features and specifications.Key Features of OPPO Reno13 FThe OPPO Reno13 F 4G is designed to meet the demands of modern users, offering a combination of impressive display quality, powerful performance, and versatile camera options. Here are some standout features: Experience a vibrant and immersive visual experience with the OPPO Reno13 F 4G’s 6.67-inch AMOLED display. With a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels, you can enjoy sharp details, vivid colors, and crisp clarity. The 120Hz refresh rate ensures ultra-smooth scrolling, perfect for gaming, browsing, and video streaming. Whether you're indoors or outside, the screen's peak brightness of 1200 nits ensures optimal visibility even in bright conditions.Powerful PerformanceUnder the hood, the OPPO Reno13 F 4G is powered by the MediaTek Helio G100 chipset, featuring an 8-core CPU and ARM G57 MC2 GPU for excellent processing power. With 8GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage, you’ll experience fast app launches, smooth multitasking, and ample space for your apps, photos, and videos. Whether you're working or gaming, this device handles it all with ease.Exceptional Camera CapabilitiesThe OPPO Reno13 F 4G stands out with its impressive camera setup. The rear camera features a 50MP wide-angle lens, an 8MP ultra-wide-angle lens, and a 2MP macro lens, allowing you to capture stunning shots in any scenario. Whether you're shooting photos, videos, or exploring creative modes like Dual-view video and Slo-mo, the camera delivers exceptional results. The 32MP front camera is perfect for selfies and video calls, ensuring clear, detailed, and vibrant shots.Long-lasting Battery and Fast ChargingStay powered throughout your day with the OPPO Reno13 F 4G's 5800mAh battery. With 45W fast charging support, you can quickly recharge your phone and get back to enjoying its many features without waiting for long. Whether you're gaming, watching movies, or working, the Reno13 F’s battery life is designed to keep up with your busy lifestyle. Stay connected with the latest in wireless technology. The OPPO Reno13 F 4G supports 4G LTE, Wi-Fi 5, Bluetooth 5.3, and NFC for fast and stable connections. With a USB Type-C port and OTG support, you can enjoy seamless data transfers and charge your phone with ease. Plus, with a range of GPS services including Beidou, GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, and QZSS, navigation is accurate and reliable wherever you go.

(180 falls)Repairability: Class CiPhone 18 Pro Max (2025) – DescriptionThe iPhone 18 Pro Max 2025 comes with a refined design and powerful performance. It supports GSM, CDMA, HSPA, EVDO, LTE, and 5G networks, ensuring global connectivity. The device was announced on September 9, 2025, and released on September 19, 2025.Its body is built with a Ceramic Shield 2 glass front, aluminum alloy frame, and aluminum alloy/glass back, making it highly durable. It measures 163.4 × 78 × 8.8 mm and weighs just 233 grams. The phone is IP68 certified, resistant to dust and water (up to 6m for 30 minutes). It also supports Apple Pay.The display features a 6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED panel with 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, Dolby Vision, and up to 3000 nits peak brightness. Protection is enhanced by Ceramic Shield 2 and Anti-reflective coating.In terms of performance, the device runs on iOS 26 and is powered by the Apple A19 Pro (3nm) chipset. It features a Hexa-core CPU and a 6-core Apple GPU. Storage options include 256GB, 512GB, 1TB, and 2TB NVMe, all paired with 12GB RAM.For photography, it offers a triple 48MP camera setup – wide, periscope telephoto (4x optical zoom), and ultrawide – along with a TOF 3D LiDAR scanner. Video recording supports 4K up to 120fps, 1080p up to 240fps, ProRes, ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, and Apple Log 2. The selfie camera includes an 18MP OIS sensor + SL 3D biometric sensor, supporting 4K video, HDR, and Dolby Vision.Audio comes through stereo speakers, though there is no 3.5mm jack. Connectivity includes Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, GPS (with NavIC), NFC, and USB Type-C 3.2 Gen 2 (with DisplayPort).Additional features include Face ID, UWB gen2 chip, Emergency SOS, Messages & Find My via satellite.The battery comes in two versions:4832 mAh (Nano-SIM model)5088 mAh (eSIM-only model)Charging features: PD3.2 fast charging (50% in 20 minutes), 25W MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging (50% in 30 minutes, 15W in China), and 4.5W reverse wired charging.The iPhone 18 Pro Max is available in Silver, Cosmic Orange, and Deep Blue. Model numbers include iPhone18,2, A3526, A3257, A3527, A3525.According to EU labeling, the phone has an Energy Class A rating, battery endurance of 53 hours and 1000 cycles, Free fall Class B (180 falls) resistance, and a Repairability rating of Class C.

With its sleek 7.3mm thin body and lightweight feel, it offers comfortable handling and premium looks. The 6.55-inch AMOLED display delivers vibrant visuals at up to 5000 nits peak brightness, making everything from videos to browsing crystal clear, even under sunlight. It runs on the powerful Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 chipset, paired with Android 15 and MagicOS 9 for a smooth, customizable experience. Capture every detail with its impressive 200MP main camera, and shoot cinematic 4K videos with ease. Whether you’re taking wide scenic shots or ultra-clear selfies, the triple camera setup and 50MP front camera won’t let you down. A 5300mAh battery ensures all-day use, and the 66W fast charging keeps you powered up in a very short time. From performance to design, this phone has everything you need for a flagship-level experience. It was released 2025, February 25. Vivo V50 has 6.77 inch, AMOLED, HDR10+, 120Hz, 1300 nits (HBM), 4500 nits (peak), a resolution of 1080 x 2392 pixels screen with Diamond Shield Glass. It uses Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) CPU, Adreno 720 GPU. vivo V50 supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM. It has 5MP Dual main camera, 5MP Single selfie camera. vivo V50 uses Si/C 6000 mAh battery.Design and DisplayThe vivo V50 features a curved AMOLED display and a slim design despite its large battery. It comes in Rose Red, Starry Night, and Titanium Grey color options. The device includes an optical fingerprint scanner and stereo speakers.The display measures 6.77 inches with a 120Hz refresh rate. It supports HDR content and reaches 1500 nits at peak and 1300 nits under sunlight (HBM mode).Performance and SoftwareThe phone runs on the same processor as its predecessor. The Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 processor is paired with up to 12GB RAM and 512GB storage. The Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 is a decent chipset that can handle most games at a satisfactory level. However, people have also argued, that there has not been a single change in itself since Vivo V30.It ships with Funtouch OS 15 based on Android 15. vivo promises three years of Android updates and four years of security patches.Cameras The V50 features a Zeiss-branded triple-camera setup, consisting of a 50MP primary sensor, 50MP ultrawide lens, and a 50MP front camera. The device supports Zeiss Multi-Focal Portraits, including Biotar Portrait Mode and 35mm B-Speed Mode. The Smart Aura Light enhances lighting conditions, and both front and rear cameras offer HDR support and 4K video recording.Battery and ChargingThe phone includes a 6,000mAh battery with 90W wired charging, an upgrade from its predecessor’s 5500 mAh battery and 80W charging. Meanwhile, the vivo V50 supports Wi-Fi 6 + 6GHz band.

Nano-SIM + eSIM + eSIM (max 2 active; International) - eSIM + eSIM (8 or more, max 2 active; USA) - Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM (China) IP68 dust/water resistant (6m for 30 min) Apple Pay (Visa, MasterCard, AMEX certified)DisplayType: LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000 nits (typ), 1600 nits (HBM), 3000 nits (peak) Size: 6.9 inches, ~90.7% screen-to-body ratio Resolution: 1320 × 2868 pixels, 19.5:9 (~460 ppi) Protection: Ceramic Shield 2 (Mohs level 5), Anti-reflective coatingPlatformOS: iOS 26 Chipset: Apple A19 Pro (3 nm) CPU: Hexa-core (2×4.26 GHz + 4×X.X GHz) GPU: Apple GPU (6-core)MemoryCard slot: No Internal: 256GB 12GB RAM / 512GB 12GB RAM / 1TB 12GB RAM / 2TB 12GB RAM Storage Type: NVMeMain CameraTriple: - 48 MP, f/1.8, 24mm (wide), 1/1.28", 1.22µm, dual pixel PDAF, sensor-shift OIS - 48 MP, f/2.8, 100mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.55", 0.7µm, PDAF, 3D sensor-shift OIS, 4x optical zoom - 48 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.55", 0.7µm, PDAF - TOF 3D LiDAR scanner (depth) Features: Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR, panorama Video: 4K@24/25/30/60/100/120fps, 1080p@25/30/60/120/240fps, 10-bit HDR, Dolby Vision (120fps), ProRes/RAW (120fps), Apple Log 2, 3D (spatial) video, stereo soundSelfie Camera18 MP multi-aspect, f/1.9, 20mm (ultrawide), PDAF, OIS SL 3D (depth/biometrics) Features: HDR, Dolby Vision HDR, 3D spatial audio, stereo, ProRes RAW, Apple Log 2 Video: 4K@24/25/30/60fps, 1080p@25/30/60/120fps, gyro-EISSoundLoudspeaker: Yes, with stereo speakers 3.5mm jack: NoCommsWLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6e/7, tri-band, hotspot Bluetooth: 6.0, A2DP, LE Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), GLONASS, GALILEO, BDS, QZSS, NavIC NFC: Yes Radio: No USB: Type-C 3.2 Gen 2, DisplayPortFeaturesSensors: Face ID, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer Ultra Wideband (UWB) gen2 Emergency SOS, Messages & Find My via satelliteBatteryLi-Ion 4832 mAh (Nano-SIM model) Li-Ion 5088 mAh (eSIM-only model) Charging: Wired PD3.2, AVS (50% in 20 min) Wireless: 25W MagSafe/Qi2 (50% in 30 min), 15W (China) Reverse wired: 4.5WAPPLE iPhone 17 Pro Max Full DescriptionThis next-generation smartphone combines a sleek design with cutting-edge hardware. It features a stunning 6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, Dolby Vision, HDR10, and an incredible peak brightness of 3000 nits. For durability, it comes with Ceramic Shield 2 protection and an anti-reflective coating.Powered by the latest Apple A19 Pro (3nm) chipset and a Hexa-core CPU, along with Apple’s 6-core GPU, the device ensures lightning-fast performance. Running on iOS 26, it delivers the smoothest user experience yet. Storage options start at 256GB and go up to a massive 2TB NVMe, all paired with 12GB of RAM.The camera system is flagship-level, consisting of:48MP wide lens with dual-pixel PDAF and sensor-shift OIS48MP periscope telephoto lens with 4x optical zoom and advanced 3D sensor-shift OIS48MP ultrawide lens (120° field of view)TOF 3D LiDAR scanner for depth sensing and ARFor video, it supports up to 4K at 120fps with Dolby Vision HDR, 10-bit HDR, ProRes RAW, Apple Log 2, and even 3D spatial video with immersive audio.On the front, it houses an 18MP ultra-wide selfie camera with PDAF, OIS, and an SL 3D depth/biometric sensor. It can shoot videos up to 4K@60fps with gyro-EIS stabilization.Connectivity options include Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, multi-band GPS with NavIC, NFC, and USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 with DisplayPort. For security and advanced features, it offers Face ID, second-gen Ultra Wideband (UWB), and satellite-based Emergency SOS, Messages, and Find My.The phone comes in two battery variants:4832 mAh (Nano-SIM model)5088 mAh (eSIM-only model)Charging speeds are impressive with 50% charge in just 20 minutes using PD3.2 wired fast charging. Wireless charging supports 25W MagSafe/Qi2 (50% in 30 minutes) and 15W in China. It also supports 4.5W reverse wired charging.Overall, this smartphone is a true ultra-premium flagship, delivering excellence across performance, display, camera, connectivity, and battery life.

details.description_text: Tecno Spark 40 (6/128GB)Display: 6.67' inches, IPS LCD Processor: Mediatek Helio G81 Camera: 50MP, 8MP Features: Fingerprint (side-mounted) DescriptionOperating SystemAndroid 15ProcessorHelio G81Network2G3G4GDimension165.6x77x7.67mmDisplay120Hz 6.67'' Hole ScreenResolution720*1600CameraFront: 8MP, Front Dual FlashRear: 50MP, Rear Dual FlashMemory128GB+12GB* (6GB Extended RAM)256GB+16GB* (8GB Extended RAM)ConnectivityGPSWiFiBTFMOTGSensorSoftware GyroscopeSide Fingerprint SensorInfrared Remote ControlBattery Capacity5200mAh45W Super ChargingLoudspeakerDual SpeakersDTS SoundTecno Spark 40 (6/128GB)The Tecno Spark 40 (6/128GB) is your perfect pick. With its sleek design, ultra-smooth display, and a big battery that keeps up with your lifestyle, this latest release from Tecno is winning hearts in Bangladesh. Whether you're a student, a multitasker, or someone who loves entertainment on the go, the Spark 40 is engineered to deliver the essentials and then some. Smartphones in this price range often come with compromises, but the Tecno Spark 40 manages to stand out by blending top-tier features with affordability. Its 6.67-inch HD+ display, lightning-fast 120Hz refresh rate, and a feature-packed 50MP dual rear camera offer you a premium smartphone experience at a mid-range budget. Add to that a solid Mediatek Helio G81 processor, a generous 6GB RAM, and 128GB storage, and you get a phone that’s ready for multitasking, gaming, and everything in between. Running on the latest Android 15, this phone is as modern and future-ready as it gets.Tecno Spark 40 SpecificationEnjoy smooth scrolling and vibrant visuals on a large 6.67-inch IPS LCD display. Whether you’re binge-watching your favorite shows or scrolling through social media, the 720x1600 resolution combined with a 120Hz refresh rate makes your experience fluid and immersive. Tecno ensures this is not just another basic screen it’s your portable entertainment hub. Under the hood, the MediaTek Helio G81 chipset delivers consistent, lag-free performance for all your day-to-day tasks. From gaming to multitasking, the Spark 40 runs effortlessly. Paired with 6GB of RAM, app switching is smooth and responsive, while the 128GB of internal storage means you have enough space for apps, photos, and files with the option to expand via OTG support.Display Size: 6.67'' Hole ScreenDisplay Type: IPS LCDResolution: 720*1600Refresh Rate: 120HzProcessor: Mediatek Helio G81RAM: 6GBROM: 128GBRear Camera: 50MPFront Camera: 8MPSpeaker: Dual SpeakersSIM: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIMNetwork: 2G/ 3G/ 4GOperating System: Android 15Fingerprint: Side Fingerprint SensorBattery: 5200mAhFast Charging: 45W Super ChargingCapture More with Camera & SpeakersThe 50MP rear camera, equipped with dual flash, allows you to shoot clear, detailed photos even in low light. Whether it’s a sunset or a selfie moment, the 8MP front camera ensures you look your best. The Tecno Spark 40 turns every photo into a memory worth sharing. Music lovers and movie buffs will appreciate the dual stereo speakers enhanced with DTS Sound technology. The immersive audio makes your favorite content come alive, offering richer bass and clear trebles that stand out even in noisy environments.All-Day Power Battery and Smart FeaturesStay unplugged longer with a 5200mAh battery designed to keep up with your daily demands. Running low? No worries. The 45W Super Charging quickly powers up your device so you're ready to go in no time ideal for those always on the move. Experience the best of Android with version 15 right out of the box. The Tecno Spark 40 is packed with smart features like a side-mounted fingerprint sensor for easy unlocking, infrared remote control, and a software-based gyroscope for enhanced gaming and AR applications.Connectivity That Keeps You ConnectedWith 4G network support, dual nano SIM slots, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, GPS, and USB Type-C, the Tecno Spark 40 ensures you're always connected whether you're at home, work, or on the go. OTG support also adds versatility by allowing you to connect USB accessories directly. At just 7.67mm thick, the Spark 40 feels great in hand without compromising on screen size or battery. Its compact 165.6x77mm body makes it both elegant and practical, ensuring it's easy to carry yet bold in appearance.
