Before ordering if there is any confusion don't hesitate to contact the seller through chat. Please leave a review if you are satisfied with your purchase. For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. iPhone 17 Pro MaxThe iPhone 17 Pro Max represents the pinnacle of Apple’s innovation, combining cutting-edge performance, advanced camera technology, and refined design into a single flagship device. Built with precision, it features a Ceramic Shield 2 front and an aluminum alloy frame, ensuring durability while maintaining a premium feel. With its expansive 6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display, users experience breathtaking visuals, vibrant colors, and smooth 120Hz refresh rates, making it ideal for everything from professional content creation to immersive entertainment.Powered by the new Apple A19 Pro chipset built on 3nm architecture, the iPhone 17 Pro Max delivers unparalleled speed, efficiency, and graphics performance. Coupled with up to 12GB of RAM and storage options up to 2TB, it is designed to handle professional-grade workflows and demanding applications effortlessly. The device also features an improved battery system with fast wired and wireless charging support, ensuring power is always within reach.Photography and videography enthusiasts will appreciate the triple 48MP camera system with wide, ultrawide, and periscope telephoto lenses, offering up to 4x optical zoom and professional-level stabilization. Combined with ProRes, ProRes RAW, Apple Log 2, and Dolby Vision HDR support, the iPhone 17 Pro Max is a powerhouse for both creators and everyday users who demand cinematic quality. The 18MP selfie camera with advanced 3D depth sensing further enhances portraits and video calls, supported by Apple’s spatial audio technology.Connectivity reaches new heights with 5G SA/NSA, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, and satellite-based features for emergency messaging and location services. The device is IP68 certified for water and dust resistance, making it reliable in all environments. Available in Silver, Cosmic Orange, and Deep Blue, the iPhone 17 Pro Max combines elegance with next-generation performance.Key Features:6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display with 3000 nits peak brightnessApple A19 Pro chipset (3nm) with 12GB RAM and up to 2TB storageTriple 48MP Pro camera system with periscope telephoto and LiDAR scannerProfessional-grade video: ProRes, ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, Apple Log 218MP front camera with 3D depth sensing and spatial audio supportAdvanced connectivity: 5G SA/NSA/Sub-6, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, UWB Gen2Durable design with Ceramic Shield 2 and IP68 water resistanceLong-lasting battery with 50% charge in 20 minutes (wired) or 30 minutes (wireless)Satellite-based SOS, messaging, and Find My support

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.BrandNothingBody163.5 x 77.5 x 8.4 mm | 201 g | 3 LED light strips on the back (notifications, camera fill light)PlatformAndroid 15, Nothing OS 3.1 | Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 (4 nm) | Octa-core | Adreno 710ModelNothing Phone 3ANetworkGSM / HSPA / LTE / 5GDisplayAMOLED | 1B colors | 120Hz | HDR10+ | 800 nits (typ) | 1300 nits (HBM) | 3000 nits (peak) | 6.77 inches | Panda Glass | Always On DisplayMemory128GB 8GB RAM | 256GB 8GB RAMMain Camera50 MP, f/1.9, (wide), PDAF, OIS | 50 MP, (telephoto), PDAF, 2x optical zoom | 8 MP, f/2.2, 119˚ (ultrawide) | LED flash, panorama, HDR | 4K@30fps, 1080p@60/120fps, gyro-EISSelfie Camera32 MP, f/2.5, (wide) | HDR | 1080p@60fpsSoundLoudspeaker | Stereo speakersBattery Info5000 mAh | Non-removable | 50W wired ChargingOther Features / InfoIP64 - splash, water and dust resistant | Fingerprint (under display, optical) | USB Type-C 2.0, OTGDescription Nothing Phone (3a)The smartphone that you have all been waiting for, the Nothing Phone 3a. An ambitious piece of tech. You still get the dramatic back design which is sure to catch attention in the room. The LED strips on the back or the glyph as Nothing calls it, can be customized to specific notifications and lots of other tasks like reminders. There is also the 6.77-inch AMOLED display which offers vibrant visuals and deep blacks. Now it’s not all about what's on the surface, it’s what’s underneath. The Nothing Phone 3a comes with the Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 chip, making it just powerful enough to keep you ahead of the pack without breaking the bank. All in all, this is one fantastic phone which has everything you would need on a budget. Nothing Phone (3a) FeaturesBe the talk of the crowd with Nothing 3a’s stylish transparent back designIconic glyph interaction provides visual cues for notifications, calls and other interactionsThe Snapdragon 7s Gen 3 has just enough power to be effective without overdoing it Large AMOLED display with deep contrasts and ultra-slim symmetrical bezels3000 nits peak brightness shows you a vivid visual even under direct sunlight50W fast charging charges your device faster so that you get less downtime5000mAh battery is sure to provide you with a days worth of backup and a bit moreIP54 certified tested for water and dust resistance makes it stronger to use anywhereAI driven essential space helps with productivity and note taking

details.description_text: Honor X5b 4/64GBThe Honor X5b is a feature-packed smartphone designed to offer powerful performance, a large display, and exceptional camera capabilities. With a 6.56-inch TFT LCD display, 13MP rear camera, 5MP front camera, and a long-lasting 20,000mAh battery, this phone is built for everyday use, whether you’re working, gaming, or capturing memories on the go. Powered by the MediaTek Helio G36 octa-core processor and running on MagicOS 8.0 (based on Android 14), it ensures a smooth and efficient experience.6.56-inch with 90Hz display 64GB stroage and microSDXC slot Fingerprint sensor 5200mAh battery capacity HONOR X5b 4GB/64GB Specifications Additional Features: 90Hz Bright & Dynamic Display | Magic Capsule | AI Object Recognition | AI Clarity Enhancement | Knuckle Screenshots | Power Button with Fingerprint | Face RecognitionOS: MagicOS 8.0 Based on Android 14Chipset: MediaTek Helio G36CPU: Octa-core (4x Cortex-A53 up to 2.2Ghz + 4x Cortex-A53 up to 1.6Ghz)GPU: IMG GE8320RAM: 4GBROM: 64GBNetwork: 2G/3G/4GSIM Card Slot: Dual Nano SIM + MicroSD (Expandable up to 1TB)Display: 6.56” TFT LCD Water Drop Screen Display | Resolution: 720x1612 | Refresh Rate: 90Hz | Aspect Ratio: 20.15:09 | Color: 16.7 million colors | Gestures: Multi-touch gestures (up to 10 touch points supported)Rear Camera: 13MP Main Camera + Auxiliary Camera | 10x Digital zoom | LED flashCamera Mechanism: Aperture: f/1.8 | Resolution: 4160×3120Photography: Portrait (including beauty mode and bokeh), High-Res, WatermarkVideo: 720/1080P@30fps | Resolution: 1920x1080Front Camera: 5MPCamera Mechanism: Aperture: f/2.2 | Resolution: 2592x1944Photography: Portrait (including beauty mode and bokeh)Video: 1080P (1920x1080) Recording | Resolution: 1920x1080Battery & Charging: 5200mAh Li-On Polymer Battery | Wired Charging: 5V/2A | USB Type-CConnectivity: Wi-Fi | Bluetooth 5.1 | PC Data Sync | OTG | GPS | USB 2.0 | 3.5mm JackSensors: Gravity Sensor | Ambient Light Sensor | Proximity Sensor | Fingerprint SensorHonor X5b 4/64GBThe Honor X5b is a feature-packed smartphone designed to offer powerful performance, a large display, and exceptional camera capabilities. With a 6.56-inch TFT LCD display, 13MP rear camera, 5MP front camera, and a long-lasting 20,000mAh battery, this phone is built for everyday use, whether you’re working, gaming, or capturing memories on the go. Powered by the MediaTek Helio G36 octa-core processor and running on MagicOS 8.0 (based on Android 14), it ensures a smooth and efficient experience.Features of Honor X5b6.56-Inch Display, Powered by MediaTek Helio G36 Octa-Core Processor, 13MP Rear Camera, Fast Charging and Long Battery Life.6.56-Inch DisplayThe Honor X5b features a 6.56-inch TFT LCD display with a 720 x 1612 resolution, delivering vibrant colors and sharp visuals for all your favorite apps, games, and media. Whether you’re browsing, watching videos, or enjoying a game, the large display ensures an immersive viewing experience with clear, crisp details.Powered by MediaTek Helio G36 Octa-Core ProcessorUnder the hood, the Honor X5b is equipped with the MediaTek Helio G36 chipset, an octa-core processor with speeds of up to 2.2GHz (4 Cortex-A53 cores) and 1.6GHz (4 Cortex-A53 cores). This powerful CPU ensures smooth performance for everyday tasks, from browsing the web to running apps, making it perfect for users who want a reliable, responsive phone.13MP Rear CameraThe 13MP rear camera of the Honor X5b allows you to capture high-quality photos and videos. With an f/1.8 aperture, it performs well in low-light conditions, ensuring clear and vibrant photos no matter the lighting. You can also shoot 720p and 1080p videos at 30fps, perfect for capturing your special moments.Fast Charging and Long Battery LifeThe Honor X5b is equipped with a Lithium-ion polymer battery that offers reliable, long-lasting power. With 5V/2A fast charging, you can quickly recharge your device and get back to using it. The phone is designed to keep you connected all day with its efficient battery performance, allowing you to enjoy media, games, and apps for hours without interruption.

This powerful CPU ensures smooth performance for everyday tasks, from browsing the web to running apps, making it perfect for users who want a reliable, responsive phone.13MP Rear CameraThe 13MP rear camera of the Honor X5b allows you to capture high-quality photos and videos. With an f/1.8 aperture, it performs well in low-light conditions, ensuring clear and vibrant photos no matter the lighting. You can also shoot 720p and 1080p videos at 30fps, perfect for capturing your special moments.Fast Charging and Long Battery LifeThe Honor X5b is equipped with a Lithium-ion polymer battery that offers reliable, long-lasting power. With 5V/2A fast charging, you can quickly recharge your device and get back to using it. The phone is designed to keep you connected all day with its efficient battery performance, allowing you to enjoy media, games, and apps for hours without interruption.

Released 2025, August 07BodyDimensions: 163.7 x 75.9 x 8.2 mm (6.44 x 2.99 x 0.32 in) Weight: 212 g (7.48 oz) SIM: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM IP Rating: IP65 dust tight and water resistant (low pressure water jets)DisplayType: AMOLED, 1B colors, 144Hz, HDR, 4320Hz PWM, 2000 nits (HBM), 5500 nits (peak) Size: 6.78 inches, 111.0 cm² (~89.3% screen-to-body ratio) Resolution: 1260 x 2800 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~453 ppi density)PlatformOS: Android 15, OriginOS 5 Chipset: Mediatek Dimensity 9400+ (3 nm) CPU: Octa-core (1x3.73 GHz Cortex-X925 & 3x3.3 GHz Cortex-X4 & 4x2.4 GHz Cortex-A720) GPU: Immortalis-G925MemoryCard slot: No Internal: 256GB 12GB RAM, 256GB 16GB RAM, 512GB 12GB RAM, 512GB 16GB RAM UFS 4.1Main CameraDual: 50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), 1/1.95", 0.8µm, PDAF, OIS 8 MP, f/2.2, (ultrawide) Features: Color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama Video: 4K, 1080p, gyro-EIS, OISSelfie CameraSingle: 16 MP, f/2.5, (wide), 1/3.0", 1.0µm Video: 1080p@30fps, gyro-EISSoundLoudspeaker: Yes, with stereo speakers 3.5mm jack: NoCommsWLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6/7, dual-band Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, LHDC 5 Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1C+B2a+B2b), GALILEO (E1+E5a+E5b), QZSS (L1+L5), NavIC (L5), GLONASS NFC: Yes Infrared port: Yes Radio: No USB: USB Type-C 2.0, OTGFeaturesSensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compassBatteryType: Si/C Li-Ion 8000 mAh Charging: 90W wired, 55W PD/PPS Reverse wired chargingMiscColors: White, Gray, Gold Models: V2507ASmartphone DescriptionLaunched in August 2025, this flagship smartphone combines powerful performance, an immersive display, and a massive battery for an all-round premium experience. It features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with HDR, 144Hz refresh rate, and an impressive peak brightness of 5500 nits, ensuring crystal-clear visibility whether indoors or under direct sunlight.Powered by the cutting-edge Mediatek Dimensity 9400+ (3nm) chipset, an advanced Octa-core CPU, and Immortalis-G925 GPU, this device delivers seamless multitasking and high-end gaming performance.For photography, it comes with a dual rear camera setup—a 50MP wide sensor (with OIS) and an 8MP ultrawide lens. The 16MP front camera captures detailed selfies and supports 1080p video with gyro-EIS for added stability. It also supports 4K video recording with excellent detail and smoothness.Battery life is one of its strongest points, packing a massive 8000 mAh Li-Ion cell with 90W wired fast charging and 55W PD/PPS support, ensuring hours of usage with just a short charge.Additional highlights include stereo speakers, under-display fingerprint sensor, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 5.4, NFC, and an infrared port.The device is available in White, Gray, and Gold color options, with model number V2507A.

Before ordering if there is any confusion don't hesitate to contact the seller through chat. Please leave a review if you are satisfied with your purchase. For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. Realme 12The Realme 12 is a cutting-edge smartphone that combines advanced technology with sleek design. Powered by the Mediatek Dimensity 6100+ chipset, it delivers remarkable performance, catering to both casual users and tech enthusiasts. With a stunning 6.72-inch display, an impressive camera system, and 5G capabilities, the Realme 12 stands out as an exceptional choice in its segment.Features of Realme 12The Realme 12 boasts a 6.72-inch IPS LCD display with 1080 x 2400 resolution, powered by the Mediatek Dimensity 6100+ chipset and 8GB RAM for seamless performance. Its 108 MP dual rear camera and 8 MP front camera capture stunning photos and videos, while the 5000 mAh battery with 45W fast charging keeps you powered all day. With 5G connectivity, 256GB storage, and advanced features like a side-mounted fingerprint sensor, the Realme 12 delivers cutting-edge technology in a sleek and lightweight design.Immersive 6.72-inch IPS LCD DisplayThe Realme 12 features a 6.72-inch IPS LCD display with a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels. This ensures vivid colors and sharp details, making it ideal for streaming videos, gaming, and browsing. The expansive screen offers a seamless viewing experience, whether you're enjoying your favorite shows or engaging in intense gaming sessions.Powerful Mediatek Dimensity 6100+ ChipsetUnder the hood, the Realme 12 is powered by the Mediatek Dimensity 6100+ chipset, built on a 6nm architecture. Its octa-core CPU, featuring 2x2.2 GHz Cortex-A76 and 6x2.0 GHz Cortex-A55 cores, ensures smooth multitasking and efficient performance. Paired with the Mali-G57 MC2 GPU, it handles graphics-intensive tasks effortlessly, providing a lag-free experience for gamers and professionals alike.Massive 8GB RAM and 256GB StorageWith 8GB of RAM and 256GB of internal storage, the Realme 12 offers ample space for all your apps, photos, and files. Whether you're a multitasker or a media hoarder, this smartphone has got you covered. Say goodbye to storage constraints and enjoy fast, seamless app performance.108 MP AI-Powered Dual Rear CameraCapture life’s best moments with the Realme 12's 108 MP main camera, equipped with PDAF and an f/1.8 aperture for stunning clarity and detail. Complemented by a 2 MP depth sensor, this dual-camera setup delivers vibrant photos with natural bokeh effects. The device also supports 1080p video recording, making it perfect for content creators. The 8 MP front camera ensures clear and beautiful selfies, enhancing your social media presence.All-Day Battery with 45W Fast ChargingThe Realme 12 comes equipped with a 5000 mAh battery that keeps you powered throughout the day. Whether you're working, gaming, or streaming, you won't have to worry about running out of juice. The 45W fast charging capability ensures you can get back to 100% in no time, keeping up with your dynamic lifestyle.Seamless Connectivity and Advanced FeaturesThis smartphone supports dual SIM with 5G connectivity, ensuring ultra-fast internet speeds for uninterrupted streaming and browsing. With Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, Bluetooth 5.2, and USB Type-C 2.0, you get a versatile and future-ready device. The side-mounted fingerprint sensor and other advanced sensors like accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass enhance security and functionality.

It features a 6.9-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, Dolby Vision, and up to 3000 nits peak brightness, ensuring an exceptional visual experience even under bright sunlight.Powered by the Apple A19 Pro (3 nm) chipset, Hexa-core CPU, and 6-core Apple GPU, this iPhone delivers unmatched speed, efficiency, and power management. It comes in multiple storage options, offering up to 2TB NVMe storage and 12GB RAM.The advanced camera system includes a triple 48MP setup and a TOF 3D LiDAR scanner, delivering professional-grade photography and videography. The main camera supports 4K@120fps ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, and 3D (spatial) video/audio recording, while the 18MP selfie camera with PDAF, OIS, and SL 3D biometric sensor ensures stunning selfies and secure Face ID functionality.Battery performance varies by model – 4832 mAh (Nano-SIM version) and 5088 mAh (eSIM-only version). The device supports PD3.2 fast charging (50% in 20 minutes), 25W MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging (50% in 30 minutes, 15W in China), and 4.5W reverse wired charging.Extra features include Face ID, Ultra Wideband (Gen2), Emergency SOS & Find My via satellite, Apple Pay, and IP68 dust/water resistance (up to 6m for 30 minutes).

Released in July 2025, this phone is all about smooth visuals, long-lasting battery, and reliable performance. It sports a stunning 6.77-inch Fluid AMOLED display with 1 billion colors, HDR10+ support, and a super-smooth 120Hz refresh rate for a truly immersive viewing experience. For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. iPhone 17 Pro Full DescriptionThe iPhone 17 Pro represents the pinnacle of Apple’s innovation, bringing together elegant design, cutting-edge performance, and advanced camera technology. Crafted with a refined aluminum alloy frame and protected by the new Ceramic Shield 2, it combines strength and sophistication while remaining slim and lightweight. With 5G support across global bands, ultra-fast performance from the Apple A19 Pro chip, and breakthrough imaging capabilities, the iPhone 17 Pro is built for those who demand the very best.OverviewThe 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display delivers breathtaking visuals with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, Dolby Vision, and peak brightness up to 3000 nits for unmatched clarity even under direct sunlight. Powered by iOS 26 and the 3nm Apple A19 Pro chipset, it ensures smooth multitasking, console-level gaming, and professional-grade editing on the go. Storage options range up to 1TB, paired with 12GB RAM, providing ample space and seamless performance for both everyday use and demanding workflows.Photography and videography reach new heights with the advanced triple 48MP camera system, featuring wide, ultrawide, and periscope telephoto lenses with up to 4x optical zoom. The addition of a TOF 3D LiDAR scanner enhances depth mapping and low-light performance, while video recording supports 4K up to 120fps, ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, Apple Log 2, and even immersive 3D spatial video. The front-facing 18MP multi-aspect camera with OIS and ProRes support ensures professional-quality selfies and video calls.The iPhone 17 Pro also introduces faster and more reliable connectivity, supporting Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, GPS with multi-band systems including NavIC, and emergency satellite communication. A robust battery ensures all-day power, supported by fast 50% charging in just 20 minutes with wired PD2.0 or 30 minutes with MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging.Key Features 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED with 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, and Dolby VisionApple A19 Pro chipset with 12GB RAM and up to 1TB storageTriple 48MP pro camera system with periscope telephoto and 3D LiDAR scanner18MP multi-aspect front camera with OIS, Dolby Vision HDR, and ProRes RAWAdvanced video capabilities including 4K 120fps, Apple Log 2, and spatial videoDual-SIM options with global 5G band support including mmWave (USA)Rugged build with Ceramic Shield 2, IP68 water resistance, and anti-reflective coatingWi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 with DisplayPort supportAll-day battery with fast wired and wireless charging, plus reverse wired chargingAvailable in Silver, Cosmic Orange, and Deep Blue

details.description_text: The Nokia C22 phone has a dual-camera setup on the back. This formation consists of a 13MP, 2MP camera. It has an 8MP selfie camera inside the notch of the display. The video recording capability is 1080p@30fps. According to its RAM and ROM, It has two (2/3GB/64GB) variants. On the other hand, it can support microSD up to 512GB on uses a dedicated slot. Certainly, C22 has a 5000mAh battery with 10W fast charging. It has a dual nano-SIM card slot. That is to say, C22 is 2G/3G/4G supportable.Mode Nokia c22WiFiWi-Fi 802.11 b/g/nBluetooth5.2, A2DPUSBUSB Type-C 2.0GPSYes with a GPSFm RadioYesFeaturesSensorsFingerprint (rear-mounted), accelerometer, proximityMessagingYesBatteryBattery TypeNon-removable Li-Po BatteryBattery Capacity5000 mAhCharging10W WiredMoreBody ColorSand, Midnight Black

optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compassBATTERYTypeLi-Po 5000 mAh, non-removableCharging90W wired, PD3.0, QC3+MISCELLANEOUSColorsBlack, Green, Titanium, Harry Potter Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 Review DetailsXiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 is a smartphone that runs on Android 14 HyperOS. It was released on 2024, April 10. Redmi Turbo 3 has 6.67 inch, AMOLED, 68B colors, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 2400 nits (peak), a resolution of 1220 x 2712 pixels screen with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus. It uses Qualcomm SM8635 Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (1×3.0 GHz Cortex-X4 & 4×2.8 GHz Cortex-A720 & 3×2.0 GHz Cortex-A520) CPU, Adreno 735 GPU. It supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). It has 5MP Dual main camera, 2MP Single selfie camera. Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 uses Li-Po 5000 mAh, non-removable battery.Design & Materials:One of the standout features of the Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 is its stunning design and premium materials. The smartphone boasts a sleek and elegant look, with a large OLED display measuring 6.67 inches and a resolution of 1200×2712 (QHD). The screen also offers a refresh rate of 120 Hz, ensuring smooth and fluid transitions while scrolling or gaming. With a peak brightness of 2400 cd/m² and support for HDR10+, it delivers vibrant colors and sharp contrast for an immersive viewing experience.In terms of audio, this mobile comes equipped with stereo speakers, Hi-Res Audio, and Dolby Atmos support, allowing users to enjoy rich and immersive sound quality. The smartphone features a mix of glass and leather materials, giving it a premium look and feel. The front and back are protected by Corning Gorilla Glass Victus, ensuring durability and scratch resistance. With an impressive usable surface of 88.5%, the Redmi Turbo 3 maximizes screen real estate for an enhanced user experience.Hardware:Under the hood, the Redmi Turbo 3 is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen3 processor, built on a 4nm architecture for lightning-fast performance. The smartphone is available in two RAM configurations – 12GB and 16GB, utilizing LPDDR5X technology for seamless multitasking and smooth app performance. Users can choose between three storage options – 256GB, 512GB, and a massive 1TB, all using UFS Storage 4.0 for lightning-fast read and write speeds.The Turbo 3 excels in benchmarks, scoring an impressive 1754299 on AnTuTu version 10. Security is also a top priority, with a fingerprint display for secure and convenient unlocking. To ensure optimal performance, this phone features a robust cooling system, including a 4800mm² ultra-large area ice circulation cold pump to prevent overheating during demanding tasks.Camera:The smartphone features a dual-camera setup, with a primary camera sporting a Sony LYT-600 sensor with 50.0 megapixels and an aperture of f/1.6 for stunning photos in any lighting condition. The wide-angle lens uses a Sony IMX355 sensor with 8.0 megapixels and an aperture of f/2.2, allowing users to capture expansive landscapes with ease. On the front, Turbo 3 houses a selfie camera with an Omnivision OV20B sensor, 20.0 megapixels, and an aperture of f/2.0.Additional camera features include optical stabilization (OIS) for shake-free videos, 4K video recording for crystal-clear footage, and even 8K video capabilities for capturing every detail in high resolution.Connectivity:The smartphone supports Bluetooth 5.4 for seamless wireless connectivity, dual SIM functionality for added flexibility, NFC for mobile payments, WiFi 6 (802.11ax) for fast and stable internet connections, GPS (L1+L5) for accurate location tracking, and even an infrared port for controlling compatible devices.Battery:Powering the Xiaomi Turbo 3 is a massive 5000mAh battery, ensuring long-lasting performance for all-day use. The smartphone also supports fast charging up to 90.0W, allowing users to quickly top up their devices and get back to their day without interruption.Overall, the Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 is a standout smartphone that offers a compelling mix of design, performance, and affordability. With its premium materials, powerful hardware, impressive camera capabilities, and robust connectivity options, the Redmi Turbo 3 is sure to impress even the most discerning smartphone users.

optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compassBATTERYTypeLi-Po 5000 mAh, non-removableCharging90W wired, PD3.0, QC3+MISCELLANEOUSColorsBlack, Green, Titanium, Harry Potter Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 Review DetailsXiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 is a smartphone that runs on Android 14 HyperOS. It was released on 2024, April 10. Redmi Turbo 3 has 6.67 inch, AMOLED, 68B colors, 120Hz, Dolby Vision, HDR10+, 2400 nits (peak), a resolution of 1220 x 2712 pixels screen with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus. It uses Qualcomm SM8635 Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (1×3.0 GHz Cortex-X4 & 4×2.8 GHz Cortex-A720 & 3×2.0 GHz Cortex-A520) CPU, Adreno 735 GPU. It supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). It has 5MP Dual main camera, 2MP Single selfie camera. Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 uses Li-Po 5000 mAh, non-removable battery.Design & Materials:One of the standout features of the Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 is its stunning design and premium materials. The smartphone boasts a sleek and elegant look, with a large OLED display measuring 6.67 inches and a resolution of 1200×2712 (QHD). The screen also offers a refresh rate of 120 Hz, ensuring smooth and fluid transitions while scrolling or gaming. With a peak brightness of 2400 cd/m² and support for HDR10+, it delivers vibrant colors and sharp contrast for an immersive viewing experience.In terms of audio, this mobile comes equipped with stereo speakers, Hi-Res Audio, and Dolby Atmos support, allowing users to enjoy rich and immersive sound quality. The smartphone features a mix of glass and leather materials, giving it a premium look and feel. The front and back are protected by Corning Gorilla Glass Victus, ensuring durability and scratch resistance. With an impressive usable surface of 88.5%, the Redmi Turbo 3 maximizes screen real estate for an enhanced user experience.Hardware:Under the hood, the Redmi Turbo 3 is powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen3 processor, built on a 4nm architecture for lightning-fast performance. The smartphone is available in two RAM configurations – 12GB and 16GB, utilizing LPDDR5X technology for seamless multitasking and smooth app performance. Users can choose between three storage options – 256GB, 512GB, and a massive 1TB, all using UFS Storage 4.0 for lightning-fast read and write speeds.The Turbo 3 excels in benchmarks, scoring an impressive 1754299 on AnTuTu version 10. Security is also a top priority, with a fingerprint display for secure and convenient unlocking. To ensure optimal performance, this phone features a robust cooling system, including a 4800mm² ultra-large area ice circulation cold pump to prevent overheating during demanding tasks.Camera:The smartphone features a dual-camera setup, with a primary camera sporting a Sony LYT-600 sensor with 50.0 megapixels and an aperture of f/1.6 for stunning photos in any lighting condition. The wide-angle lens uses a Sony IMX355 sensor with 8.0 megapixels and an aperture of f/2.2, allowing users to capture expansive landscapes with ease. On the front, Turbo 3 houses a selfie camera with an Omnivision OV20B sensor, 20.0 megapixels, and an aperture of f/2.0.Additional camera features include optical stabilization (OIS) for shake-free videos, 4K video recording for crystal-clear footage, and even 8K video capabilities for capturing every detail in high resolution.Connectivity:The smartphone supports Bluetooth 5.4 for seamless wireless connectivity, dual SIM functionality for added flexibility, NFC for mobile payments, WiFi 6 (802.11ax) for fast and stable internet connections, GPS (L1+L5) for accurate location tracking, and even an infrared port for controlling compatible devices.Battery:Powering the Xiaomi Turbo 3 is a massive 5000mAh battery, ensuring long-lasting performance for all-day use. The smartphone also supports fast charging up to 90.0W, allowing users to quickly top up their devices and get back to their day without interruption.Overall, the Xiaomi Redmi Turbo 3 is a standout smartphone that offers a compelling mix of design, performance, and affordability. With its premium materials, powerful hardware, impressive camera capabilities, and robust connectivity options, the Redmi Turbo 3 is sure to impress even the most discerning smartphone users.

For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. Key Features of the Redmi Note 14Stunning Display and Modern DesignThe Redmi Note 14 boasts an impressive FHD+ display that offers vibrant colors and sharp resolution. Whether you're watching videos, browsing the web, or playing games, the display delivers a rich visual experience that’s hard to beat at this price point.In terms of design, the phone has a sleek and ergonomic build, making it comfortable to hold and use. Its modern design gives it a premium look without the premium price tag.Performance and EfficiencyUnder the hood, the Redmi Note 14 is powered by a MediaTek chipset, which ensures smooth and efficient performance across various tasks. Whether you're browsing, streaming, or multitasking, the phone handles everything with ease, ensuring you won’t experience lag or slowdowns.The device also excels in multitasking, with enough processing power to handle several apps running simultaneously, providing a fluid user experience.Camera QualityThe dual-camera setup of the Redmi Note 14 is equipped with AI enhancements that deliver crisp and vibrant photos. The camera adjusts settings automatically to ensure you capture great shots in various lighting conditions.For selfie lovers, the front-facing camera is built to capture high-quality selfies, making sure your social media game stays on point.Long-Lasting Battery LifeA key selling point of the Redmi Note 14 is its 5000mAh battery, which can last through a full day of heavy use. You won’t have to worry about running out of juice during your daily activities, whether you’re using the phone for work or entertainment.With fast charging technology, the Redmi Note 14 also allows you to recharge quickly, ensuring you’re always ready to go without long waits.Storage and Memory OptionsThe Redmi Note 14 offers flexible storage and RAM options, so you can choose a configuration that suits your needs. Whether you need more storage for photos, videos, and apps, or additional RAM for smooth multitasking, this device has you covered.Software and User InterfaceRunning on MIUI 15, the latest version of Xiaomi’s user-friendly interface, the Redmi Note 14 offers an intuitive and customizable experience. With features designed to improve usability and enhance security, MIUI 15 ensures a smooth and enjoyable user experience.

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.SpecificationModelMoto G98BrandMotorolaNetworkGSM / HSPA / LTE / 5GDimensions161.9 x 73.3 x 7.9 mmWeight178 gSIMNano-SIM + Nano-SIMDisplay TypeP-OLED, 1B colors, 144Hz, 1600 nits (peak)Display Size6.67 inchesDisplay Resolution1080 x 2400 pixelsOSAndroid 15ConnectivityWi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band | Bluetooth: 5.2, A2DP, LE | NFC: No | Radio: No | USB: USB Type-C 2.0, OTGChipsetQualcomm SM7435-AB Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 (4 nm)CPUOcta-coreMemory128GB 8GB RAM, 256GB 8GB RAM | UFS 2.2Main Camera50 MP, f/1.9, (wide), multi-directional PDAF, OIS | 8 MP, f/2.2, (ultrawide) | LED flash, HDR, panorama | 4K@30fps, 1080p@30/60/120fps, gyro-EIS, OISSelfie Camera32 MP, f/2.2, (wide) | HDR | 4K@30fps, 1080p@30fps, gyro-EISSoundYes, with stereo speakers (with Dolby Atmos)Battery Info5500 mAh | Non-removable | 30W WiredSensorsFingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compassOther Features / InfoSmart Connect 2.0 | Glass front (Gorilla Glass 5), silicone polymer back (eco leather), plastic frame | IP68 dust tight and water resistant (immersible up to 1.5m for 30 min)Description Motorola Moto G96 5GThe Motorola Moto G98 5G is that friend who looks way more expensive than they actually are. This thing packs a gorgeous 6.67-inch P-OLED screen that's smoother than your morning coffee with its 144Hz refresh rate, plus it gets bright enough to blind your enemies at 1600 nits. The Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 chipset keeps everything snappy whether you're doom-scrolling TikTok or actually being productive, while that chunky 5500mAh battery laughs at your heavy usage habits.The 50MP camera with optical stabilization means even your butter fingers can capture crisp shots, and the ultrawide lens saves you from those awkward "everyone squeeze in" moments. Wrapped in eco-leather that feels surprisingly premium and built tough enough to survive your clumsiest days with IP68 protection, this phone basically dares you to find a better deal. It's running Android 15 fresh out the box, ready to be your reliable daily driver without breaking the bank. Before ordering if there is any confusion don't hesitate to contact the seller through chat. Please leave a review if you are satisfied with your purchase. For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. IntroductionApple’s iPhone 16 is here, and it’s already making waves in the smartphone world. As the latest addition to Apple’s iconic lineup, the iPhone 16 brings a fresh set of features, refined design, and powerful performance that aims to elevate the user experience. But what makes the iPhone 16 stand out, and is it worth considering as your next smartphone? In this article, we’ll explore everything you need to know about the iPhone 16, from its key features and design to its price and availability in Bangladesh.Apple iPhone 16The iPhone 16 is more than just an upgrade; it represents Apple’s commitment to pushing the boundaries of smartphone technology. With a sleek design, upgraded camera system, and the latest in processing power, the iPhone 16 sets a new standard for what a smartphone can be. It’s built for those who demand performance, style, and the latest tech at their fingertips.Design and Build QualityApple has once again refined its design philosophy with the iPhone 16. The device features a stunning glass back and aluminum frame, providing both elegance and durability. Available in an array of new colors such as Midnight, Starlight, Blue, and Pink, the iPhone 16 caters to different tastes, making it not just a phone but a fashion statement.The iPhone 16 is also slightly thinner and lighter than its predecessor, making it more comfortable to hold and use. Its Ceramic Shield front cover offers extra protection against scratches and drops, ensuring your phone looks great even after daily use.Display: Vivid and ImmersiveThe iPhone 16 sports a 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, which is perfect for watching videos, playing games, or just browsing the web. The OLED panel delivers sharp, vibrant colors with deep blacks, providing an immersive viewing experience. True Tone technology adjusts the display to match the lighting around you, making it easier on the eyes in any environment.Performance: Powered by the A17 Bionic ChipUnder the hood, the iPhone 16 is powered by Apple’s latest A17 Bionic chip, which offers industry-leading performance. With a 6-core CPU, 5-core GPU, and a 16-core Neural Engine, this chip handles everything from gaming and video editing to AI-driven tasks with remarkable speed and efficiency. Whether you’re multitasking between apps or running intensive games, the iPhone 16 delivers smooth, lag-free performance.Camera: Capture Life in Stunning DetailThe iPhone 16 features a dual-camera setup, consisting of a 48MP main sensor and a 12MP ultra-wide lens. The improved camera system allows for stunning photos and videos, even in challenging lighting conditions. New computational photography features enhance every shot, making colors more vibrant and details crisper.Night mode has been improved, allowing for brighter and clearer photos in low-light situations, while the Smart HDR 5 enhances photos by balancing highlights and shadows perfectly. Video enthusiasts will appreciate the enhanced 4K video recording capabilities, with improved stabilization for smoother footage.Battery Life and Charging: Stay Powered All DayBattery life is always a key concern, and Apple has made sure the iPhone 16 delivers. With an improved battery that supports up to 20 hours of video playback, you can use your phone throughout the day without constantly searching for a charger. The device supports fast charging, allowing you to get up to 50% charge in just 30 minutes with an appropriate adapter. MagSafe wireless charging is also available, making it convenient to charge your phone without plugging in.Software: iOS 17 for a Seamless ExperienceThe iPhone 16 runs on iOS 17, Apple’s latest operating system, which brings a host of new features and improvements. With more customizable home screens, enhanced widgets, and improved privacy controls, iOS 17 offers a more personal and secure experience. New accessibility features make the phone even easier to use for everyone, and seamless integration with other Apple devices keeps your digital life in sync.5G Connectivity and Advanced Wireless FeaturesThe iPhone 16 is equipped with 5G capabilities, ensuring faster internet speeds, lower latency, and a more reliable connection. Whether you’re streaming videos, playing online games, or making video calls, 5G connectivity keeps you connected with minimal lag. Wi-Fi 6E support further enhances wireless performance, making your internet connection faster and more stable.Enhanced Security and Privacy FeaturesApple continues to prioritize user security with the iPhone 16. Face ID has been improved for faster and more accurate facial recognition, making it easy to unlock your phone, access secure apps, and make payments safely. iOS 17 also includes advanced privacy settings that give you more control over your data, keeping your personal information secure from prying eyes.Storage Options to Fit Your NeedsThe iPhone 16 comes in three storage options: 128GB, 256GB, and 512GB. This range ensures that there’s a model to suit every need, whether you’re a casual user who mainly uses cloud storage or someone who needs extra space for photos, videos, and apps.Durability and Water ResistanceWith an IP68 rating for water and dust resistance, the iPhone 16 is built to withstand the elements. Whether you accidentally drop it in water or get caught in the rain, your device is protected against damage. The toughened glass and Ceramic Shield front cover add an extra layer of durability, ensuring your phone can handle everyday wear and tear.Where to Buy the iPhone 16 in BangladeshIf you’re looking to buy the iPhone 16 in Bangladesh, it’s important to purchase from trusted sources to ensure you receive a genuine product with a valid warranty. Sumash Tech, known as an authentic mobile, laptop, and gadget shop, is one of the best places to buy Apple products in Bangladesh. They offer genuine devices with official warranties, providing you with peace of mind with your purchase.Is the iPhone 16 Worth It?The iPhone 16 offers a fantastic balance of design, performance, and features, making it an excellent choice for anyone in the market for a new smartphone. It’s perfect for those who want a powerful device that doesn’t compromise on style or functionality. While it might not have all the advanced features of the Pro models, the iPhone 16 provides a premium experience at a more accessible price point.ConclusionThe iPhone 16 is a testament to Apple’s ability to deliver high-quality smartphones that cater to a wide audience. With its beautiful design, powerful performance, and advanced camera system, it’s a great choice for anyone looking to upgrade their phone. For those in Bangladesh, the iPhone 16 is available at competitive prices, making it an attractive option in the current smartphone market.

That 6.7-inch LTPO P-OLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate? Smooth. The curved edges? Comfortable without feeling flimsy. And the 50MP main camera with OIS? Sharp, even when the lighting isn’t on your side. Under the hood, you’ve got a Dimensity chipset that keeps things fast without unnecessary gimmicks. 5G ensures you’re not stuck waiting. TurboPower charging gets you back in action quickly. And with near-stock Android, you’re not drowning in pre-installed junk. It’s a phone that does what it’s supposed to without the unnecessary fluff. Motorola Edge 60 Fusion 5G FeatureCombination of tough glass front and eco-leather back, so it’s as stylish as it is durableWith a massive 6.67-inch LTPO OLED display, your viewing experience will be smoothThe 50 MP main sensor is perfect for those sharp and detailed shotsEnhanced with OIS and dual pixel PDAF, your shots stay sharp even in low light.Record 4K video without breaking a sweat with gyro-EISThe 32 MP front camera ensures you’ll look your best in every shotFrom 0 to full in no time, so you spend more time using the phone and less time waiting.

details.description_text: Premium Design: Glass front with Ceramic Shield 2, aluminum frame, and IP68 dust and water resistance. Immersive Display: 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, and 3000 nits peak brightness. Powerful Performance: Apple A19 chipset with hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU for unmatched speed and graphics. Dual Main Camera System: 48MP wide and 48MP ultrawide with advanced OIS, HDR, and 4K Dolby Vision HDR video recording. High-Resolution Front Camera: 18MP wide lens with OIS, SL 3D depth sensor, Dolby Vision HDR, and spatial audio. Next-Generation Connectivity: Extensive 5G band support, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, Ultra Wideband (gen2), GPS with multi-band positioning, and satellite SOS. Long-Lasting Battery: 3692 mAh with fast wired charging (50% in 20 minutes), MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging, and reverse charging support. Ample Storage: Available in 256GB and 512GB NVMe options with 8GB RAM. Colors: Black, White, Mist Blue, Sage, and Lavender. No RETURN is applicable if the seal is broken. No returns will be applicable in case of a change of mind. If the ordered color is not in stock, the seller will be obliged to provide another color; no returns will be applicable in this field. In an accidental case, mobile devices (Broken Display, Dent, Burn, shock, Water damage, manual update, or Root) void the warranty. 0% EMI available. If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering. As the product's price is volatile, the cost of any product may change at any moment aligned with the market price. E-warranty will be pre-activated for transferable warranty issues on official products. Warranty for official products should be claimed from the authorized service center, and no warranty products will have no warranty. Kong)iPhone 17OverviewThe iPhone 17 redefines innovation with a sleek design, powerful performance, and advanced connectivity. Built with a Ceramic Shield 2 front, aluminum frame, and glass back, it combines durability with elegance. The device introduces a 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display with up to 3000 nits peak brightness, ensuring stunning visuals in any environment. Powered by the groundbreaking Apple A19 chipset built on a 3nm process, it delivers unmatched speed and efficiency for both everyday use and demanding applications.With advanced camera systems, including a dual 48MP main setup and an 18MP front camera with Dolby Vision HDR support, photography and videography reach new heights. The iPhone 17 is designed for seamless global connectivity, supporting extensive 5G bands, Wi-Fi 7, and satellite communication for emergency use. Its software, iOS 26, enhances productivity and personalization while offering a secure and intuitive user experience.Key FeaturesPremium Design: Glass front with Ceramic Shield 2, aluminum frame, and IP68 dust and water resistance.Immersive Display: 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, and 3000 nits peak brightness.Powerful Performance: Apple A19 chipset with hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU for unmatched speed and graphics.Dual Main Camera System: 48MP wide and 48MP ultrawide with advanced OIS, HDR, and 4K Dolby Vision HDR video recording.High-Resolution Front Camera: 18MP wide lens with OIS, SL 3D depth sensor, Dolby Vision HDR, and spatial audio.Next-Generation Connectivity: Extensive 5G band support, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, Ultra Wideband (gen2), GPS with multi-band positioning, and satellite SOS.Long-Lasting Battery: 3692 mAh with fast wired charging (50% in 20 minutes), MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging, and reverse charging support.Ample Storage: Available in 256GB and 512GB NVMe options with 8GB RAM.Colors: Black, White, Mist Blue, Sage, and Lavender.

Kong)iPhone 17OverviewThe iPhone 17 redefines innovation with a sleek design, powerful performance, and advanced connectivity. Built with a Ceramic Shield 2 front, aluminum frame, and glass back, it combines durability with elegance. The device introduces a 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display with up to 3000 nits peak brightness, ensuring stunning visuals in any environment. Powered by the groundbreaking Apple A19 chipset built on a 3nm process, it delivers unmatched speed and efficiency for both everyday use and demanding applications.With advanced camera systems, including a dual 48MP main setup and an 18MP front camera with Dolby Vision HDR support, photography and videography reach new heights. The iPhone 17 is designed for seamless global connectivity, supporting extensive 5G bands, Wi-Fi 7, and satellite communication for emergency use. Its software, iOS 26, enhances productivity and personalization while offering a secure and intuitive user experience.Key FeaturesPremium Design: Glass front with Ceramic Shield 2, aluminum frame, and IP68 dust and water resistance.Immersive Display: 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, and 3000 nits peak brightness.Powerful Performance: Apple A19 chipset with hexa-core CPU and Apple GPU for unmatched speed and graphics.Dual Main Camera System: 48MP wide and 48MP ultrawide with advanced OIS, HDR, and 4K Dolby Vision HDR video recording.High-Resolution Front Camera: 18MP wide lens with OIS, SL 3D depth sensor, Dolby Vision HDR, and spatial audio.Next-Generation Connectivity: Extensive 5G band support, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, Ultra Wideband (gen2), GPS with multi-band positioning, and satellite SOS.Long-Lasting Battery: 3692 mAh with fast wired charging (50% in 20 minutes), MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging, and reverse charging support.Ample Storage: Available in 256GB and 512GB NVMe options with 8GB RAM.Colors: Black, White, Mist Blue, Sage, and Lavender.

Vivo iQOO Neo 10R 5G is here to effortlessly keep up with everything you do. From stunning visuals on its 6.78-inch AMOLED screen to blazing-fast performance, this phone makes every moment better. You can dive into your favorite games, streaming videos, or capturing memories; the Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 chip ensures everything runs smoothly. Released 2025, April 28BodyDimensions: 163.7 x 75.9 x 8.1 mm (6.44 x 2.99 x 0.32 in) Weight: 206 g (7.27 oz) Build: Glass front, plastic back, plastic frame SIM: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM IP Rating: IP65 dust tight and water resistant (low pressure water jets)DisplayType: AMOLED, 1B colors, 144Hz, 4320Hz PWM, HDR, 2000 nits (HBM), 4400 nits (peak) Size: 6.78 inches, 111.0 cm² (~89.3% screen-to-body ratio) Resolution: 1260 x 2800 pixels, 20:9 ratio (~453 ppi density)PlatformOS: Android 15, OriginOS 5 Chipset: Qualcomm SM8735 Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 (4 nm) CPU: Octa-core (1x3.21 GHz Cortex-X4 & 3x3.0 GHz Cortex-A720 & 2x2.8 GHz Cortex-A720 & 2x2.0 GHz Cortex-A720) GPU: Adreno 825MemoryCard slot: No Internal: 256GB 12GB RAM, 256GB 16GB RAM, 512GB 12GB RAM, 512GB 16GB RAM UFS 4.1Main CameraDual: 50 MP, f/1.8, (wide), 1/1.95", 0.8µm, PDAF, OIS 8 MP, f/2.2, (ultrawide) Features: Color spectrum sensor, LED flash, HDR, panorama Video: 4K@30/60fps, 1080p, gyro-EIS, OISSelfie CameraSingle: 16 MP, f/2.5, (wide), 1/3.0", 1.0µm Video: 1080p@30fps, gyro-EISSoundLoudspeaker: Yes, with stereo speakers 3.5mm jack: NoCommsWLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6/7, dual-band Bluetooth: 6.0, A2DP, LE, aptX HD, aptX Adaptive, aptX Lossless, LHDC 5 Positioning: GPS (L1+L5), BDS (B1I+B1C+B2a), GALILEO (E1+E5a), QZSS (L1+L5), GLONASS NFC: Yes Infrared port: Yes Radio: No USB: USB Type-C 2.0, OTGFeaturesSensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compassBatteryType: Si/C Li-Ion 7000 mAh Charging: 120W wired, 100W PD, 100W PPS 50% in 15 min, 100% in 33 min Reverse wired chargingMiscColors: White, Black, Orange, Gold Models: V2453ASmartphone DescriptionReleased in April 2025, this smartphone is designed for users who demand speed, power, and durability. It features a 6.78-inch AMOLED display with 1B colors, 144Hz refresh rate, HDR, and up to 4400 nits peak brightness, ensuring stunning visuals even under direct sunlight.Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8s Gen 4 (4 nm) chipset with an advanced Octa-core CPU and Adreno 825 GPU, it delivers exceptional performance for gaming, multitasking, and everyday use.On the camera side, the device offers a dual rear camera setup with a 50 MP wide lens (OIS) and an 8 MP ultrawide lens, supporting 4K@60fps video recording with gyro-EIS and OIS for stable, high-quality footage. The 16 MP front camera ensures sharp selfies and smooth 1080p video recording.Its 7000 mAh battery with 120W wired fast charging and 100W PD/PPS support allows 50% charge in just 15 minutes and a full charge in 33 minutes, keeping you powered throughout the day.Other key features include stereo speakers, under-display fingerprint sensor, Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, NFC, infrared port, and an IP65 rating for dust and water resistance.The phone comes in White, Black, Orange, and Gold color options, with model number V2453A.

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.Unmatched Display BrillianceThe Realme 15 redefines smartphone visuals with its groundbreaking 6.8-inch OLED display, setting new standards in its class. Boasting an extraordinary 6500 nits peak brightness - the highest in any smartphone - it delivers perfect visibility even under harsh sunlight. The 144Hz refresh rate ensures buttery-smooth scrolling and gaming, while the industry-leading 4608Hz PWM dimming significantly reduces eye strain during prolonged use. With a crisp 1280 x 2800 resolution (453 ppi) and support for 1 billion colors, every image pops with stunning clarity and vibrant hues. The 91.2% screen-to-body ratio achieved through minimal bezels and Gorilla Glass protection creates an immersive viewing experience that rivals premium flagships.Military-Grade Durability Meets EleganceRealme has engineered the 15 to withstand life's toughest challenges without compromising on style. Available in three sleek color variants with subtly different thickness profiles (7.66mm to 7.96mm), it maintains an impressively lightweight design at just 187-189g. The IP68/IP69 certification ensures complete protection against dust and water immersion up to 2 meters for 30 minutes, while the MIL-STD-810H compliance guarantees resilience against drops and extreme conditions. This ruggedness is cleverly concealed beneath a premium exterior that belies its tough nature, proving that protection and aesthetics can coexist harmoniously.Next-Level PerformanceAt its core, the Realme 15 packs the cutting-edge MediaTek Dimensity 7300+ chipset built on an efficient 4nm process. The octa-core CPU configuration combines four powerful Cortex-A78 cores with four efficient Cortex-A55 cores, delivering flagship-level performance optimized for power efficiency. The Mali-G615 MC2 GPU handles graphics-intensive tasks effortlessly, making it an excellent choice for mobile gamers. Running the latest Android 15 with Realme UI 6.0, users can expect a smooth, bloat-free experience with regular software updates that extend the device's longevity.Professional-Grade PhotographyThe Realme 15's camera system punches far above its weight class. The 50MP main sensor features a large 1/1.56" sensor size, PDAF, and optical image stabilization for stunning low-light shots. It's complemented by an 8MP ultra-wide lens with a 112° field of view for expansive landscapes. Both cameras support 4K video recording with gyro-EIS and OIS stabilization for buttery-smooth footage. The 50MP front camera captures incredibly detailed selfies and also supports 4K video, making this one of the most capable camera phones in its segment for both photography and videography enthusiasts.Unprecedented Battery EnduranceWith its massive 7000mAh battery - one of the largest in any smartphone - the Realme 15 sets new benchmarks for battery life. Even power users will struggle to drain this powerhouse in a single day. When recharge is needed, the blistering 80W wired charging can juice up the device in record time. This combination of marathon endurance and sprint charging makes it ideal for travelers, outdoor enthusiasts, and anyone who demands reliable all-day performance from their device.Smart Features That Elevate the ExperienceBeyond its impressive hardware, the Realme 15 includes thoughtful features that enhance daily use. The under-display optical fingerprint sensor offers both security and convenience, while stereo speakers provide immersive audio. The inclusion of an infrared port is a welcome throwback feature for controlling appliances. With Wi-Fi 6 and Bluetooth 5.4, connectivity is fast and reliable, while comprehensive satellite positioning (GPS, GLONASS, GALILEO, BDS) ensures accurate navigation.The New Mid-Range BenchmarkThe Realme 15 represents a quantum leap in what consumers can expect from mid-range smartphones. It combines a best-in-class display, professional camera capabilities, military-grade durability, and exceptional battery life in a package that challenges premium flagships. While it lacks some features like NFC and wireless charging, its strengths more than compensate, making it one of the most compelling devices in its class. For users who refuse to compromise on quality but need to watch their budget, the Realme 15 sets a new standard for value-packed performance.

details.description_text: Tecno Spark 40 Pro (8/128GB)Display: 6.78 inches, 1.5K Ultra Bright AMOLED Processor: Mediatek Helio G100 Ultimate (6nm) Camera: 50MP + 13MP Features: Under Display Fingerprint sensor DescriptionOperating SystemAndroid 15ProcessorMediaTek Helio 100 UltimateNetwork2G3G4GDimension163.67*75.87*6.69mmDisplay144Hz 6.78'' AMOLED Flexible DisplayResolution1224*2720CameraFront: 13MPRear: 50MP, Rear Dual FlashMemory128GB+16GB* (8GB Extended RAM)ConnectivityGPSWiFiBTFMOTGNFCSensorSoftware GyroscopeInfrared Remote ControlBattery Capacity5200mAh45W Super ChargingLoudspeakerDual SpeakersDolby AtmosTecno Spark 40 Pro (8/128GB)The Tecno Spark 40 Pro (8/128GB) is designed for users who demand more more speed, more clarity, more innovation. With a dazzling AMOLED display, a powerful MediaTek chipset, and a massive battery, this phone redefines what you expect from a mid-range device. Whether you're gaming, creating content, or just scrolling endlessly, the Spark 40 Pro is built to impress.Tecno Spark 40 Pro SpecificationDive into immersive visuals with a 6.78-inch 1.5K AMOLED screen that shines at an impressive peak brightness of 4500 nits. Whether you’re outside under direct sunlight or watching late-night content, the Corning Gorilla Glass 7i ensures top-tier durability while the ultra-thin bezels bring you closer to a truly edge-to-edge experience. The 144Hz refresh rate keeps animations silky smooth, perfect for gaming or rapid multitasking.Display Size: 6.78-inchDisplay Type: 1.5K Ultra Bright AMOLEDRefresh Rate: 144hzBrightness: 4500nits PeakProtection: Corning Gorilla Glass 7iFeatures: Super thin bezelsProcessor: Mediatek Helio G100 Ultimate (6nm)CPU Type: Octa-coreRAM: 8GBROM: 128GBRear Camera: 50MPFront Camera: 13MPFingerprint: Under Display Fingerprint sensorBattery Type: 5200mAhFast Charging: 45WSpeed Meets EfficiencyUnder the hood, the Spark 40 Pro is powered by the MediaTek Helio G100 Ultimate processor, a 6nm chipset designed for performance without compromise. The octa-core CPU architecture ensures fluid responsiveness, whether you're running heavy apps, editing photos, or switching between tasks. With 8GB of RAM and 128GB of internal storage, you get ample space and speed to handle everything seamlessly.Capture Your World with PrecisionPhotography gets a serious boost with the 50MP AI rear camera, enhanced with dual flash for low-light brilliance. Record vivid memories in up to 2560x1440 resolution, ensuring crisp detail in every frame. Selfies are just as sharp, thanks to the 13MP front camera, also backed by dual flash and capable of Full HD 1080p video recording. Whether it's a selfie moment or landscape shot, the Spark 40 Pro has you covered.Feel Every BeatEnjoy crystal-clear sound with dual stereo speakers powered by Dolby Atmos. From movies to music, your audio experience gets a major upgrade, delivering rich, 3D-like soundscapes that make every moment come alive.Everything You Need, All in One PlaceStay connected with dual SIM 4G support, Wi-Fi 5 (5GHz), and Bluetooth 5.3. Navigate confidently with built-in GPS and A-GPS. The under-display fingerprint sensor adds a modern, secure touch, while the IP64 water and dust resistance ensures everyday protection. Bonus? The built-in IR remote control turns your phone into a smart hub for your home. 5200mAh Battery with 45W Fast ChargingBuilt to Withstand, Designed to ImpressWith a massive 5200mAh battery, the Tecno Spark 40 Pro is built to last all day and then some. When it’s time to recharge, the 45W fast charging technology powers up your device in no time—so you're never out of action for long. Despite its power-packed features, the Spark 40 Pro stays slim at just 6.7mm thick. It’s SGS-certified for drop resistance, ensuring added protection in real-life usage. The premium design, combined with durability and a compact footprint, makes this phone as tough as it is beautiful.

Brand: Apple Model: iPhone 15 Display Size: 6.1 inches Display Type: Super Retina XDR OLED, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000–2000 nits Display Resolution: 1179 x 2556 pixels Chipset: Apple A16 Bionic (4 nm) Memory: 128GB | 256GB | 512GB Main Camera: 48 MP (wide) | 12 MP (ultrawide) | Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR (photo/panorama) | 4K@24/25/30/60fps, , HDR, Dolby Vision HDR (up to 60fps), Cinematic mode (4K@30fps) Selfie Camera: 12 MP, f/1.9, 23mm (wide) | SL 3D, (depth/biometrics sensor) | HDR, Cinematic mode (4K@30fps) | 4K@24/25/30/60fps gyro-EIS Battery Info: Li-Ion | non-removable, wired Type-C charging, 15W wireless (MagSafe) iPhone 15The Apple iPhone 15 features a stunning design that seamlessly marries durability and elegance. Its display sets a new standard for visual excellence, offering a breathtaking visual experience. The dynamic island feature enhances user interaction and convenience. Powered by an unbelievably impressive performance, it tackles any task effortlessly. Photography enthusiasts will adore the enhanced camera capabilities, which deliver outstanding shots. Notably, the introduction of Type-C connectivity marks a significant step forward for the iPhone, making it more versatile and adaptable than ever. The iPhone 15 truly redefines excellence in the smartphone world. iPhone 15 FeaturesThe stunning design is a result of the fusion between color-infused glass and recycled aluminumSuper Retina XDR OLED display with ceramic shield protection for astounding visualA dynamic island pops up on the top to notify users of important alerts and live activities 48 MP main camera with upgraded resolution and lenses for magnificent photographyA16 Bionic with cutting-edge features that elevate performance to utmost smoothnessWith its optimized, high-capacity battery, it can run for an entire day on a single chargeSupports the Universal Type C charger, allowing you to establish a charging ecosystem Roadside Assistance via satellite is the new emergency feature, along with SOS and Crash Detection

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.Infinix Hot 60i DescriptionThe Infinix Hot 60i is a feature-packed smartphone designed to deliver smooth performance, stylish looks, and reliable battery life at an affordable price point.It comes with a 6.7-inch HD+ IPS LCD display offering a 120Hz refresh rate, 700 nits brightness, and a punch-hole design with Gorilla Glass protection. The slim bezels ensure an immersive viewing experience, making it great for videos, gaming, and everyday use.Under the hood, the Hot 60i is powered by the MediaTek Helio G81 Ultimate chipset with an Octa-core CPU (2x Cortex-A75 + 6x Cortex-A55) and ARM G52 MC2 GPU, delivering smooth multitasking and gaming. It runs on Android v15 with XOS 15.1 UI, paired with 6GB LPDDR4X RAM and 128GB storage, expandable up to 1TB via microSD.For photography, the device features a 50MP dual rear camera setup (f/1.8 wide + 0.08MP auxiliary lens) with HDR, digital zoom, and dual-LED flash. It supports 2K video recording at 30fps. On the front, it has an 8MP selfie camera (f/2.0) capable of HD video recording.In terms of design, the phone measures 166 x 76.6 x 7.7 mm, weighs 188g, and comes with a glass front, plastic back, and plastic frame. It is available in multiple attractive colors: Sleek Black, Titanium Silver, Shadow Blue, Neon Red, Meadow Green, and Soul Eye Purple. With IP64 certification, the phone is splash and dust resistant.Battery life is one of its strong points, equipped with a 5160mAh Li-Polymer battery that supports 45W fast charging (50% in just 24 minutes) and 10W reverse wired charging.Connectivity options include Dual SIM (Nano + Nano) with 2G, 3G, and 4G LTE, VoLTE, Wi-Fi 5, Bluetooth 5.3, GPS with A-GPS, NFC, and USB Type-C 2.0.Security is handled by a side-mounted fingerprint scanner and Face Unlock, along with sensors like light, proximity, accelerometer, compass, and gyroscope.For multimedia, the Hot 60i comes with FM Radio, a loudspeaker, 3.5mm audio jack, and support for 1440p/1080p video playback. In short, the Infinix Hot 60i combines a smooth 120Hz display, reliable performance, strong cameras, and fast charging, making it an excellent budget-friendly choice for users who want style and performance in one package.Infinix Hot 60i Full SpecificationsCategorySpecificationsGeneralBrandInfinixModelHot 60iDevice TypeSmartphoneRelease Date25 June 2025StatusAvailableHardware & It was released in 2024, on May 31. Honor 200 has 6.7 inch, OLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, HDR, 4000 nits (peak), a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels screen. It uses Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) CPU, Adreno 720 GPU. Honor 200 supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). Honor 200 5G has 5MP Triple main camera, 5MP Single selfie camera. It uses 5200 mAh, non-removable battery.Display:6.7 inches OLED Capacitive Touchscreen, 1B colors supported punch hole display phone has a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels with a PPI of 436.Body and sensors:Made of a glass front, plastic frame, and plastic back, the mobile is 161.5 mm in height, 74.6 mm wide, and 7.7 mm in thickness. It weighs 187 g available. The mobile is available in 4 colors on the market. The colors are Black, Silver, Blue & Pink. Being a sensor accelerometer, gyro, compass, ultrasound proximity, and light sensor. The under-display, optical fingerprint runs quite accurately fast. Face unlock is correct & secured.Network:The phone has supported 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G Network facilities. Moreover, GPRS and EDGE facilities also have. HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, 5G speed on the phone.Performance:Android 14 Operating system and Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm), Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) processor on the phone.RAM and ROM:The company has launched the phone in 5 variants of 8GB/256GB, 12GB/256GB, 16GB/256GB, 12GB/512GB & 16GB/512GB. In the case of gaming, graphics, and RAM are fairly good. FHD-quality graphics games can be easily run and played quite smoothly.Camera:The Honor 200 is well-equipped in the camera department. The 50MP primary camera is coupled with the 1/1.56” Sony IMX906 sensor with OIS support. Moreover, it also houses a telephoto lens as well as an ultrawide/macro camera as auxiliary units. The former is a 50MP shooter with the Sony IMX856 sensor while the latter is a 12MP snapper. In the meantime, the front camera is also a 50MP unit.The Back of the phone has a 50MP+50MP+12MP camera with which you can record beautiful quality pictures and a maximum of 4k@30fps video. Moreover, it remains an extra feature like The phone has a 50MP selfie camera with which you can take beautiful quality pictures and selfies. You can record a maximum of 4k@30fps video with the front camera. High–quality selfie work can be done effortlessly with the camera on the phone.Battery:This phone packs a large 5,200 mAh battery with 100W wired charging support. The cell in the Honor 200 is the company’s silicon-carbon battery that offers a leading level of endurance. With this, you can get an average of up to 110 hours of standby time, and 13 hours of net browsing. At full charge, you can talk for up to 35 hours on 2G. The phone will take about 27 minutes with 100W supper fast charging to fully charge.

As you get a Super AMOLED panel on the large display, which makes your content viewing much more immersive than regular devices. Built for everyday use, it comes with a massive 6.9-inch IPS LCD display with a 120Hz refresh rate, ensuring fluid scrolling, gaming, and video playback. Powered by the Helio G81 Ultra chipset with Android 15 and HyperOS 2, it delivers reliable multitasking and a smooth user experience.A huge 6000mAh battery keeps you powered throughout the day, while 33W fast charging ensures you spend less time plugged in. Capture stunning details with the 50MP dual main camera and enjoy clear selfies and video calls with the 8MP front camera. BrandSamsungModelGalaxy S25 UltraNetworkGSM / CDMA / HSPA / EVDO / LTE / 5GDimensions162.8 x 77.6 x 8.2 mmWeight218 gSIMNano-SIM + eSIM | Dual Nano-SIMDisplay TypeDynamic LTPO AMOLED 2XDisplay Size6.9 inchesDisplay Resolution1440 x 3120 pixelsOSAndroid 15, One UI 7ChipsetQualcomm Snapdragon 8 EliteCPUOcta-coreMemory12GB RAM | 256GB/512GB/1TB storageMain CameraQuad: 200 MP (wide), 10 MP (telephoto), 50 MP (periscope telephoto), 50 MP (ultra-wide) | LED flash, auto-HDR, panorama | Laser AF | 8K@24/30fps, 4K@30/60fps, 1080p, 10-bit HDR, HDR10+, stereo sound rec., gyro-EISSelfie Camera12 MP | HDR, HDR10+ | 4K@30/60fps, 1080p@30fpsSoundStereo speakers, 32-bit/384kHz audio, tuned by AKGBattery InfoLi-Ion 5000 mAh | Non-removable | 45W wired | 25W wireless (Qi2) | 4.5W Reverse WirelessSensorsFingerprint (under display, ultrasonic)DescriptionSamsung Galaxy S25 Ultra 5GSamsung Galaxy S25 series is set to introduce a range of innovative AI features, enhancing user experience with smarter interactions. Powered by the Qualcomm Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset, it offers lightning-fast performance and seamless multitasking with up to 1TB of storage and 16GB of RAM. The device boasts a stunning 6.8-inch Dynamic LTPO AMOLED 2X display, providing vibrant visuals with a 120Hz refresh rate. Its quad-camera setup includes a 200MP primary sensor, offering exceptional photography capabilities. With IP68 water resistance and advanced Wi-Fi 7 connectivity, this phone is both durable and connected. Enjoy rapid charging with 45W wired and 25W wireless options, ensuring your device stays powered throughout the day. The Galaxy S25 Ultra is designed to deliver an unparalleled mobile experience, blending style, performance, and cutting-edge technology. Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra 5G FeaturesComes with a flat design on both sides with a sleek titanium frame.Large AMOLED screen with a high refresh rate is a peace of the eye.Feel lightning-fast performance with the Snapdragon 8 Elite.Improve your daily productivity with personalized AI-driven insights.Quad camera setup with powerful lenses to capture beyond. A large battery with flash charging will keep you powered all day long.

details.description_text: NO return is applicable if the seal is broken• 10-day seller replacement guarantee• No returns will be applicable in case of change of mind.• In Accidental Cases Mobile (Broken Display, Dent, Burn, Shock, Water Damage or Manual Update or Root) service Warranty or replacement guarantee will not be applicable• 0% EMI available. If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.Smartphone Full SpecificationsCategoryDetailsNetworkTechnology: GSM / HSPA / LTE / 5GLaunchAnnounced: 2025, May 29 Status: Available. Released 2025, June 05BodyDimensions: 164.3 x 74.6 x 7.5 mm (6.47 x 2.94 x 0.30 in) Weight: 188.5 g (6.67 oz) Build: Glass front (Gorilla Glass 7i), plastic frame, plastic back SIM: Nano-SIM + Nano-SIM IP64 dust tight & water resistant (splashes)DisplayType: AMOLED, 144Hz, 2304Hz PWM, 1300 nits (peak) Size: 6.78 inches, 109.9 cm² (~89.7% screen-to-body ratio) Resolution: 1080 x 2436 pixels (~393 ppi density) Protection: Corning Gorilla Glass 7iPlatformOS: Android 15 (planned upgrade to Android 16), HIOS 15 Chipset: Mediatek Dimensity 7300 Ultimate (4 nm) CPU: Octa-core (4x2.5 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4x2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) GPU: Mali-G615 MC2MemoryCard slot: No Internal: 128GB 6GB RAM, 128GB 8GB RAM Storage Type: UFS 2.2Main CameraDual: 64 MP, f/1.8, (wide), 1/1.73", 0.8µm, PDAF + 2 MP, f/2.4 (depth) Features: LED flash, HDR, panorama Video: 4K@30fps, 1080p@30fpsSelfie CameraSingle: 13 MP Video: 4K@30fps, 1080p@30fpsSoundLoudspeaker: Yes, with stereo speakers (Dolby Atmos) 3.5mm Jack: NoCommsWLAN: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6, dual-band Bluetooth: 5.4, A2DP, LE Positioning: GPS NFC: Yes Infrared port: Yes Radio: FM radio USB: USB Type-C 2.0, OTGFeaturesSensors: Fingerprint (under display, optical), accelerometer, proximity, compass Extra: Circle to SearchBatteryType: Li-Po 5500 mAh Charging: 45W wired (50% in 15 min, 100% in 45 min)MiscColors: Neon Cyan, Magic Silver, Geek Black Models: LJ8kSmartphone DescriptionThis smartphone blends elegant design, powerful performance, and modern features to deliver an all-round experience. Measuring 164.3 x 74.6 x 7.5 mm and weighing just 188.5g, it offers a slim, lightweight build with a Gorilla Glass 7i front, plastic frame, and back. With IP64 protection, it’s resistant to dust and water splashes, making it durable for everyday use.The 6.78-inch AMOLED display brings visuals to life with a 144Hz refresh rate, 2304Hz PWM dimming, and up to 1300 nits peak brightness. Paired with a 1080 x 2436 pixel resolution (~393 ppi) and Corning Gorilla Glass 7i protection, the screen delivers smooth, vibrant, and immersive viewing.Under the hood, the phone runs Android 15 with a planned upgrade to Android 16, powered by the Mediatek Dimensity 7300 Ultimate (4nm) chipset, Octa-core CPU, and Mali-G615 GPU. Storage options include 128GB with 6GB or 8GB RAM using UFS 2.2 technology, ensuring fast performance and smooth multitasking.On the rear, a 64MP wide lens with PDAF and a 2MP depth sensor capture detailed photos, supported by LED flash, HDR, and panorama. Video recording reaches up to 4K@30fps. The 13MP selfie camera also supports 4K video, perfect for crisp selfies and video calls.Audio quality is enhanced with stereo speakers featuring Dolby Atmos, though it lacks a 3.5mm jack. Connectivity options include Wi-Fi 6, Bluetooth 5.4, NFC, infrared port, GPS, FM radio, and USB Type-C with OTG support.For security and convenience, it includes an under-display fingerprint sensor, accelerometer, proximity sensor, compass, and the innovative Circle to Search feature.A robust 5500mAh Li-Po battery powers the device, supporting 45W fast charging (50% in just 15 minutes, 100% in 45 minutes), keeping you connected all day with minimal downtime.Available in stylish colors – Neon Cyan, Magic Silver, and Geek Black – this model, LJ8k, is designed for users who demand both style and performance.

Brand: Apple Model: iPhone 15 Pro Display Size: 6.1 inches Display Type: LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000–2000 nits Display Resolution: 1179 x 2556 pixels Chipset: Apple A17 Pro (3 nm) Memory: 128GB | 256GB | 512GB Main Camera: 48 MP (wide) | 12 MP (periscope telephoto) | 12 MP (ultrawide) | TOF 3D LiDAR scanner (depth) | Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR (photo/panorama) | 4K@24/25/30/60fps 10-bit HDR, Dolby Vision HDR (up to 60fps), ProRes, Cinematic mode (4K@24/30 fps), 3D (spatial) Selfie Camera: 12 MP (wide) | SL 3D, (depth/biometrics sensor) | HDR, Cinematic mode (4K@24/30fps) | 4K@24/25/30/60fps, 1080p@25/30/60/120fps, gyro-EIS Battery Info: Li-Ion, non-removable; Type-C Wired Charging; 15W wireless (MagSafe) iPhone 15 ProIntroducing the Apple iPhone 15 Pro, a groundbreaking masterpiece in the world of smartphones. This extraordinary device marks a historic milestone as Apple's first-ever titanium-built iPhone, setting new standards for durability and design. Boasting impressive build quality, its sleek exterior houses a display that offers unparalleled clarity, elevating your visual experience to new heights. Equipped with an unbelievably capable camera, it redefines photography and videography, delivering stunningly clear and vibrant visuals. Powered by a pro-grade processor, in seamless collaboration with an advanced operating system, it ensures outstanding performance. With remarkable battery life and fast charging capabilities, the iPhone 15 Pro stands as one of the finest smartphones to date, setting a benchmark for innovation and excellence. iPhone 15 Pro FeaturesCrafted using aerospace-grade titanium combined with distinctive finishesTitanium construction renders it among the lightest and most robust smartphones availableFeatures an LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display for exceptional visual experienceThe legacy of Dynamic Island continues to keep you informed with each notificationEquipped with the formidable A17Pro Bionic chipset for flawless performanceCutting-edge Monsters 3nm CPU and a Pro-Class GPU for immersive mobile gaming48MP triple camera system, delivering mesmerizing photography with unparalleled detailCapture enchanting videos with pristine clarity and the ability to relive them with VisionProA multi-functional action button designed to enhance convenience and controlOffers a positive battery with advanced optimization, ensuring daylong battery lifeComes with a Universal Type-C charger to guarantee seamless iPhone charging Introduces the newly added emergency service of Roadside Assistance via satellite

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.Samsung Galaxy Z Fold7 Get your movie moments come alive and dive into gaming instantly with Samsung’s Galaxy Z Fold7. This fold is not any normal device, it unfolds into a creative canvas and while folded it becomes a pocket-friendly smartphone. And this folding and unfolding is protected with the world's greatest Armor FlexHinge design which makes it thinner than before. Besides its incredible built quality, you also get a stunning large display when unfolded to view your movies immersively. And when folded, it’s ready for your everyday productivity in one compact package. Talking about productivity, there's the Snapdragon's Elite chipset inside, which gives you octa-core processing for handling your everyday tasks and gaming activity smoothly. Moreover, you can also capture gorgeous photos and videos from its rear triple camera lens. When you require better photography edits, there’s Galaxy AI, ready for all your magic edits & customization. All that awesome power can be enjoyed longer with a large battery inside, which gives you hours of efficiency in productivity & multimedia consumption.
