Featuring a vivid 6.78-inch AMOLED display, a powerful Dimensity 8350 Ultimate processor, and industry-leading 100W fast charging, this smartphone is built to keep up with everything your day throws at you—from multitasking to mobile gaming to content creation.Features of Infinix Note 50 Pro+ 5GAMOLED Display with Up to 144Hz Refresh Rate, Dimensity 8350 Ultimate Chipset, Pro-Grade Camera System with Dual OIS & 4K Video, 5200mAh Battery with 100W Fast Charging.AMOLED Display with Up to 144Hz Refresh RateEnjoy rich colors and stunning clarity on the 6.78-inch FHD+ AMOLED display, boasting a sharp 1080 x 2436 resolution and a dynamic refresh rate that switches between 60Hz, 120Hz, and 144Hz for buttery-smooth scrolling and optimized performance. Whether you're gaming or binge-watching, the display shines bright with up to 1300 nits peak brightness, and the Always-On Display feature keeps essential info visible at a glance.Dimensity 8350 Ultimate ChipsetPowered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Ultimate processor, this phone runs like a beast. Built on an advanced 4nm architecture with an octa-core CPU and Mali-G615 MC6 GPU, it delivers ultra-fast performance and energy efficiency. Paired with 12GB RAM and 256GB internal storage, the Infinix Note 50 Pro+ 5G handles everything from high-end gaming to multitasking with absolute ease.Pro-Grade Camera System with Dual OIS & 4K VideoCapture the moment with a triple rear camera setup featuring two 50MP OIS sensors and an 8MP lens for ultra-clear shots and steady videos. Whether you're recording in 4K at 60FPS, shooting in portrait mode, or experimenting with features like Super Night, Pro, or Dual Video mode, the results are nothing short of stunning. The 32MP front camera also ensures your selfies and vlogs are sharp, vibrant, and social-ready.Battery with Fast ChargingForget low battery anxiety with the massive 5200mAh battery that easily powers through a full day of use. And when it’s time to refuel, 100W fast charging gets you back to full power in no time. Plus, with reverse charging support, your phone becomes a portable power bank when needed.

If there is any confusion regarding EMI, please contact the seller through chat to know how to avail EMI before ordering.BrandXiaomiBodyBlack & White: 161.3 x 75.3 x 9.35 mm, 226g | Silver Chrome: 161.3 x 75.3 x 9.48 mm, 229g | Build: IP68 Water & Dust ResistantPlatformSnapdragon 8 Elite (3nm) | 2x Prime Core (4.32GHz) + 6x Performance Core (3.53GHz) | Adreno 830 | Xiaomi HyperOS 2ModelXiaomi 15 UltraNetworkGSM / HSPA / LTE / 5GRam16GB LPDDR5XDisplay6.73" WQHD+ AMOLED | 3200 nits peak brightness | 120Hz LTPO | Xiaomi Shield Glass 2.0 | Dolby Vision | HDR10+Storage512GB / 1TB UFS 4.1 (No microSD)Main CameraLeica Quad Camera: 50MP Main, 1" sensor, f/1.63, OIS | 200MP Periscope Telephoto, 100mm, f/2.6, OIS, 120x digital zoom | 50MP 70mm Floating Telephoto, f/1.8, OIS | 50MP Ultra-wide, 115° FOV, f/2.2Selfie Camera32MP In-display Camera, f/2.0, 90° FOVSoundStereo speakers | Dolby Atmos | Hi-Res Audio | 4-Mic ArrayBattery Info5410mAh | 90W wired HyperCharge | 80W wireless HyperChargeOther Features / InfoXiaomi 3D Dual-Channel IceLoop | AI Writing, AI Speech Recognition, AI Interpreter, AI Creativity Assistant, Circle to Search (Google) | Ultrasonic in-display fingerprint sensor, AI Face Unlock | Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, NFC, Dual SIM/eSIM SupportDescription Xiaomi 15 UltraXiaomi 15 Ultra is here, bringing cutting-edge technology and a premium flagship experience. Powered by the Snapdragon 8 Elite processor, this phone ensures lightning-fast performance in every use case. With up to 16GB RAM and 1TB storage, you’ll never have to worry about speed or space. If you love photography, here is a Leica-powered quad-camera system featuring a 200MP ultra telephoto lens, a 50MP 1-inch main sensor, and two additional lenses for unmatched detail and clarity. From ultra-wide landscapes to zoomed-in portraits, every shot looks professional. Plus, it supports 8K video recording and cinematic features, so your videos will look as stunning as your photos. The 6.73-inch WQHD+ AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and 3200 nits brightness delivers ultra-smooth visuals, making gaming and streaming more immersive. With Xiaomi’s 5410mAh Surge Battery and 90W HyperCharge, you can go all day without worrying about power. IP68 water-resistant body, Xiaomi’s advanced cooling system, and premium build make this device durable. Whether you're capturing memories, enjoying entertainment, or pushing limits with AI tools, the Xiaomi 15 Ultra will impress you. Xiaomi 15 Ultra Features Capture every moment in any light with a Leica-powered quad-camera system.Enjoy smooth and vibrant visuals with a large AMOLED display.A powerful chipset ensures a fast and reliable performance. Smart AI features assist in writing, voice commands, and creative tasks.A long-lasting battery with ultra-fast charging keeps you powered up.Durable and water-resistant design combined with an advanced cooling system.

Get long battery life for more than a day effortlessly with a large battery inside to keep your creativity running. Its elegant design houses a bright 6.7-inch AMOLED display that delivers rich colors and smooth motion with a 120Hz refresh rate and HDR support. Powered by the cutting-edge Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 chipset and backed by up to 16GB RAM, this phone ensures seamless multitasking and gaming. Capture every moment with a triple rear camera setup featuring a 200MP main sensor, 50MP telephoto with 3x zoom, and a 12MP ultrawide lens. The dual selfie camera adds even more versatility for photography lovers. Plus, a 5300mAh battery with blazing-fast 100W wired and 80W wireless charging keeps you powered throughout the day.
